description: Come explore with NASA and discover the latest images, videos, mission information, news, feature stories, tweets, NASA TV and featured content with the NASA App for Android. Features: - Over 14,000 images (and growing everyday) - Latest news and features stories - Latest on demand NASA videos from around the agency - Current NASA mission Information - Live streaming of NASA TV - Live streaming video from the High Definition Earth Viewing (HDEV) experiment on the ISS - Launch information & countdown clocks - Current visible passes for the International Space Station (ISS) and notifications - Current visible passes for other missions (Fermi, Hinode, Hubble...) - ISS and Earth orbiting satellite trackers - NASA Twitter Feeds from around the agency - Facebook® Connect and integrated Twitter™ client for easy sharing - Schedule for NASA TV and NASA-Related Programming on Other TV Channels - Map, information and links to all of the NASA visitor centers - Featured content and program sections - Earth as Art image collection and interactive map - Third Rock Radio (alternative rock radio station) - Favorites & image bookmarks - 5 star rating system for images and videos with top rated list
release_text: - Fix for Third Rock Radio - Minor bug fixes & stability improvements If you're experiencing any problems and need technical support for the NASA App: Please email us at: arc-dl-mobile@mail.nasa.gov

description: DOWNLOAD WITH US, CANADIAN GREAT LAKES & GULF OF MEXICO NAUTICAL CHARTS OVERLAYS!!! You have been searching for affordable and meaningful app product to enhance your saltwater fishing activities and we have good news. Fishing Ops Pro uses the latest technologies to empower you with information and insight from every experience so you can maximize your results. We deliver the best in class saltwater fishing application and website for our valued friends (AKA customers). We designed Fishing Ops Pro to be easy and effective regardless of your activity or experience level. When we share what we love and by aligning our passion for our product with your passion for quality, our community will grow as big as the Great Outdoors! Your data is kept totally secure with a unique system, which is only accessible by you! Here is what you get in our product: 1. EXCELLENT MAPS- Navigate marine environments with confidence in different terrains and bodies of water. 2. GPS NAVIGATION AND ONE-TOUCH WAYPOINTS - Easily maintain current position, view the relationship to other points of interest, and quickly mark waypoints of fishing interest and navigational interest. 3. CATCH/CATCH & RELEASE/RECON NOTES- Save your pictures and easily record your tackle and tactic details and easily compare the next time you go. Fish with confidence! 4. FISHING CAMERA- Capture all the action without leaving the app and every picture can auto collect all of the environmental details automatically! 5. AUTO-JOURNAL- No more hand written journals that steal your time. The first ever journal that auto stores every fishing activity and auto collects all the environmental details. 6. AUTO TRIP SHARING- Never wait again for pictures, everyone auto shares all the memories from your angling exploits automatically! 7. FISHING WEATHER- Get the forecast, marine forecast, tides, barometer and the lunar phase. 8. EAST TRIP SETUP- Set up your trip and invite your buddies for a seamless experience that collects all the pictures, all the waypoints and all the fun! 9. FISH-ON STEALTH NOTIFICATIONS- When you are fishing with friends but in different locations and you don't want to let the whole world know over the radio or don't have time to text or call, we offer a one-and-done push button that sends your friends your activity and gives them your GPS location for getting in on the action! 10. US STATE BY STATE FISHING REGS- Is it legal? Never worry when the game warden checks your cooler. 11. ON-BOARD SUPPORT- We offer you the answers to your questions with amazing support that answers all requests within one hour. Read the poor support of other apps. We love our products and our friends (AKA Customers) and we are always ready to help! 12. METRIC AND IMPERIAL SETTINGS- Easily switch all measurement to what you are accustomed to very easily. 13. IN-APP SOCIAL MEDIA SHARING- Connect with buddies, share info and pictures easily and seamlessly!

RPSC GK app : let us prepare for RPSC Examination. Content : * Current GK * Rajasthan GK * General Science * Geography * Indian History Feature * Quiz based learning system * Important and selected question * Useful App for RPSC Lecturer * Useful for RTET,REET and teacher Regular updated.

KillSud - Killer Sudoku is a variation of Sudoku, as described at Wikipedia: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Killer_sudoku In addition to the rules of regular Sudoku, there are two more rules in KillSud: 1) The sum of all numbers in a cage must match the small number printed in its corner. 2) No number appears more than once in a cage. Play the exciting game of KillSud and test your skills. * KillSud contains over 4,000 puzzles ranging from fairly easy to really complicated in 6 levels of difficulty. * A special sum calculator to help in choosing the numbers. * Detailed help is available under "menu". * AutoSave / AutoRestore of ongoing puzzle. * Undo moves (no redo) - See Help for details. If you encounter any bug in KillSud please e-mail the developer with details. Don't report it in reviews NOTE1: Click the white area of the running timer to toggle showing elapsed time on/off. NOTE2: The little purple box below the [new] button is an addition helper. Click on it and the sum of the "marked cage" is added. To prevent adding the same cage twice, each cage can be added to the addition helper ONLY ONCE (until the helper is cleared) Long-click the helper to clear it.
release_text: version 6.4: Menu button on bottom-left. This will bring a "menu" screen. Exit this screen ONLY with "Return" button. version 6.3: If menu button is not available (neither by long-click task switcher, nor by 3 dots) then click the 3 white bars at the bottom-left of the main screen (where you choose the level of play) This should solve the "missing" menu button for newer android versions.

description: Track World’s all leading US, European and Asian Stock Market Indices. All major Global market indexes including Dow Jones, Nasdaq, CAC, DAX, Nikkei, Hang Seng and many more are displayed in tabular format. * All US, European and Asian Markets are displayed as list in separate tabs * Feature to view the full details of individual market index with charts on click of stock name row * Full size charts * Related News Stories * Ability to add/remove indices of your choice. * Optimized for tablets **Pro version is now available.** If you like this application, consider upgrading to "Global Stock Markets Pro" to support the development of the app. Pro version is faster, cleaner and Ad free. Pro version has seven chart options.
release_text: * Improvement in search functionality * Bug fixes For any issue with the app, please email at codeandro@gmail.com Thanks.

description: MightyMeeting is the best way to share presentations, videos, interactive applications, and drawings in the classroom, meeting room, and online. PowerPoint presentations and PDF documents can be stored in your private and secure online content repository, downloaded to your Android tablet, and opened anywhere, even when your device is not connected to the Internet. You can quickly switch between presentations or jump to any slide in a presentation. You can annotate slides with drawings. You can also create an interactive whiteboard and use it to draw diagrams or write mathematical equations. Content, applications, and drawings can be shared in online meetings. A meeting attendee can join via tablet, phone, or any other device with a web browser. At the end of a meeting, you can email slides, annotations, and drawings as a PDF document. Here are just a few ways to use MightyMeeting: -Open a sales presentation and share it with a prospect locally or remotely -Take turns presenting slides and drawings in a team meeting -Brainstorm on product design ideas by drawing on a shared whiteboard -Control slides remotely and share the whiteboard in a boardroom meeting -Share mathematical formulas and diagrams with fellow researchers -Teach a class remotely and share slides and drawings with your students Use MightyMeeting today to engage your audience and transform a one-way presentation into a collaborative experience. Make Every Meeting a Mighty Meeting.
release_text: Provided the multiple choice questions plugin

description: Sports Cards makes it fun to make your own fully customized baseball, basketball, cricket, dance, football, soccer, hockey, bowling, golf, martial arts, racing, tennis, and volleyball sport cards for you and your teams! Just like the pros! Customize the color, player name, team name and position, then take or select a photo to personalize one of four cool card designs. More designs are available for purchase to give you 16 different card styles to choose from. Lots of combinations to choose from. Found a style that you like? Use the clone feature to quickly build out an entire collection for your whole team! Once your card is created share with your friends through Facebook, Twitter and more. We are constantly making improvements on the application. So please make sure to connect with us on Facebook, Twitter or Email with any feature requests or problems. Thank you everyone for making us the #1 Sports Card creator application in the Google Play store!

Version 1.6.3.1 - Fixed some caching issues - Updates for support for Android 5.0 Version 1.6.1.1 - Added better image caching. description: Watch as shining, ever changing star patterns and cloud formations unfold. There is an eye hidden in the galaxies. Once you see the eye, you can’t unsee the eye... You will soon drift away into outer space. Watch the morphing star patterns, while relaxing or meditating. You can enjoy this free version for as long as you want, but the full version has much more features! You can choose the color, size and brightness of the stars. You can also choose the backgrounds, the speed and much more. Battery saving functionality is included in the full version and it has no commercials.

Droid Calendar Widget is a stylish interactive calendar widget that displays events from the Google calendar on your homescreen. Select a day to see all events for that day or add new events right from the widget. You can flip forwards and backwards through the months with the arrow buttons and jump back to the current day with the calendar button. The widget comes with a black and a white base skin and its appearance can be further customized with options including widget opacity, font colors, icon color, today color, selected day color, event color and more. The calendar optionally displays week numbers, and the event time format and starting day of the week can be adjusted. The eventbox under the calendar can be configured to show events up to one month in the future from the currently selected day. #### IMPORTANT NOTICE #### I just received an email with the offer to buy 5-star-ratings for this app. I WON'T buy ratings! If this app has any ratings, you can be sure that those are honest ratings from real users!
release_text: Fix for eventbox opacity setting on Android 4.1 and below.

description: Good morning is an app that includes the best good morning quotes to share with you friends, family or couple. Since there is no better way to begin the day than with a motivational quote that helps start our day on the right foot, we have decided to develop this app featuring the best good morning images. All of them have been exclusively created to be used in this fun app so we hope you like them. Main features: - You’ll find different categories to say “good morning” to your couple, friends or even relatives. - The app can’t be easier to use. Open it and just use the arrows to scroll through images. If there’s an image of your liking, you can share it by pressing the center button. - You can edit the images you like the most by adding your own custom texts. You can choose font size, text location and color as well!. Customize the designs of your liking and give them a personal touch. - The best way to start a day full of energy and enthusiasm is with quotes full of joy and illusion. This is why all images have been created so you can share them with all your friends, relatives or the person you love the most. - This app is highly recommended if you also want to wish a good day to the person you love and want. A “good day my love” or “good day princess” is always the best way to start the day and your couple will be grateful. - You can also download or even add a wallpaper with the designs of your choice. This way you can cheer yourself up in the morning to wake up with more enthusiasm and illusion. - You can add the designs you like the most to “favorites” as we’ve implemented a favorites system so you access them in a faster way. - You can also share these images through any other app installed in your smartphone. You can send them via SMS, email and through any instant messaging program. Also, you can send the messages you like most through any social network. - 100% in English. This app has been created with good morning messages completely in English. We hope you have a lot of fun using this app, as much as we’ve had developing it. If you liked it, we’d be really grateful if you could rate the app positively as this will help and encourage us to keep adding new images and quotes to start the day on the right foot. Legal notice/Disclaimer: All the pictures included in this app have been exclusively created by designers for MuchoApps, therefore, the commercial use of any image within the app is prohibited without the prior consent of MuchoApps. Images from public domain have been used for the photomontages, as they are not identified in any way that states the reserved exploitation of such. Any natural or legal person, who appears to be the owner of any images contained therein, may accredit it via email to info@muchoapps.com , committing ourselves to the immediate withdrawal of the image after verification of the protected photo ownership.

Do you want to control your expenses and be always aware of how much money you have spent and obtained over the past day, week, month or even year? This program will be the best financial assistant for you in this regard. You will always be informed of your financial possibilities. The app will show you, where you can save money and where you can spend more than usual. It is much easier to do this by using categories (food, clothes, car), accounts (cash, bank card, deposit), currencies (dollars, euros, pounds) and transfers (from one account to another). Your details will be securely saved. Daily automatic archiving will not allow you to lose data, and syncing with the cloud will save them, even if the device fails to function. You can set the app logon password, just in case your device is used by others, so you can stop worrying about your data confidentiality. You can easily use the application and you will be able to quickly add new recordings of expenses. The program requires a minimum of time for keeping records; it is easy enough for novices, while it provides rich functionality and a lot of settings for experienced users. One base on different devices. Thanks to the syncing with the cloud, the whole family can use the application. Your phone will inform you of any change in the database with a notification. You can log in to the app using Android, iOS and Blackberry devices or via WEB-interface (browser), following the link “ http://walletsapp.com ”. Forget about past problems of unknown losses and counting money for a long time. Now you have a reliable program that will help you: - Reduce your expenses; - Calculate the total capital in different currencies; - Save your family budget; - Assess your financial possibilities; As our ancestors used to say, money likes to be counted! Therefore, a personal banking system allows you to safely manage any money transactions, look through charts and reports, and sort your incomings and expenses according to different categories. Download the mobile application and do not lose sight of any financial transaction. System capabilities: - Addition of accounts (including multicurrency), categories (and subcategories); - Addition of transactions and remittances (in the same or different currencies); - View of the current exchange rates used in the application; - Syncing with the cloud and other Android, iOS and Blackberry devices; - Export of the selected data to Excel and XML; - Automatic archiving of data with the possibility of recovery; - App logon password; - View of the current funds in the same currency; - Widget to quickly add transactions; - Graphical reports according to the categories, accounts and currencies; - Daily, weekly, monthly and annual reports on the incomings and expenses; - Graphic report on the size of the capital in different currencies for a selected period; - Ability to change the color of the interface, date and time formats; - Log in to the application database via a browser (WEB-version), following the link http://walletsapp.com ; - Built-in calculator. Differences from the free version: - No advertising; - Export of data to Excel and XML. Create your own financial history and always keep up with the flow of your own cash!
release_text: • Added the ability to hide selected wallets; • Fixed a bug with cloning groups, operations and wallets; • Fixed a bug with restoring the database from a file; • Fixed some synchronization errors (in some cases could be copied clone of objects to the cloud).

description: Tower defense like you’ve never seen it before: crisp, beautiful, addictive, unmatched magic. Elf Defense sets a new standard for the tower defense genre, with gorgeous HD graphics, over 100 enemies to defeat, a sophisticated system of unit recruitment and upgrade, all packaged within an absorbing narrative. Defend the elven homeland against the intrusion of human oppressors. Despite the historical generosity the elves have shown toward their human brethren, the human kingdom has chosen to relentlessly exploit their peaceful friends. Even these peace-loving elves have a breaking point, and it’s been reached as human forces attempt to overrun their very homes. Retina display optimization and unmatched art direction make Elf Defense a pleasure to play; superior game design makes it irresistibly addictive. REVIEWS: ★★★★★ "If you're looking for a hefty tower defense title and you've got an appetite for darling designs, you ought to check this out." Toucharcade ★★★★★ "Elf Defense is a TD game that hits all the right notes." - 148Apps Editor's Choice! ★★★★★ "Stunning-looking tower defence title" - PocketGamer ★★★★★ "Elf Defense is a fantastic looking game" - Gizmodo- Gaming App of the Day! ★★★★★ "A refreshing new tower defense game" AppSafari - Featured App! ★★★★★ "The best tower defense title of the month, Elf Defense impresses with tons of customization options and strong graphics." Metacritic ★★★★★ "Elf Defense proves that tower defense games can still be fun and feel totally original" Gamezebo ★★★★★ "Elf Defense manages to make tried and true mechanics feel new again with its style." Appolicious ★★★★★ "Truly impressive" - iPhoneappcafe ★★★★★ 10/10 Score! "Elf Defense is guaranteed to keep you coming back" - Tapscape ★★★★★ "Retina-display optimized HD graphics in a beautifully bright palette combined with polished animation and superior character design make Elf Defense, hands-down, the best looking castle defense game in the App Store. " - Todaysiphone FEATURES: ▷ Deploy a wide variety of units, each with their own special combat skills, to take down the enemy before they breach your walls! ▷ Over 100 enemy types make strategy a dynamic, evolving challenge ▷ Breathtakingly crisp graphics are put to good use with a gorgeous color palette and exceptional, unique character design ▷ Special items enhance tactics and provide players with the ability to tailor their strategy to suit their own playing style ▷ Adjustable difficulty makes Elf Defense fun for tower defense newbies and veterans alike ▷ Shop is packed with upgrades and items; players can purchase with in-game currency or buy additional currency ▷ GameCenter integration ▷ Gorgeous environments?Fairy Forest, Desolate Desert, Frozen Artic ▷ Collect formidable mercenary warriors to enhance your forces - Elf defense / Elf defence -

description: With the help of application "Sounds of nature" you can dive in the sea world, you can walk on forest paths and listen to the music of rain. Sounds of nature have a salutary influence on us and fight stress. Best qulaity of the sounds! No ads! === The application requires the loading of additional 35 megabytes on the first run. Make sure WiFi is connected. === It's not a secret that lots of living organisms influence each other with the help of sounds. Sounds can be divided into negative ones (we call them noises) and positive ones. Negative sounds can affect our health, and positive ones, on the contrary, have a wholesome effect on us. It has been scientifically proved that nature sounds belong to positive ones. Now we even have a special branch of medicine – sound therapy. The Lite version of the application contains 7 atmospheres: - Summer forest and Сreek - Night forest and Bonfire - Sounds of sea and ocean - Rain and thunder - Countryside - Sea ​​trip - Car and rain Main functions of the application "Sounds of nature. Lite". - Timer - On/off of the different sounds, adjust the volume of any sound - Quality of the sound All our sound atmospheres comprise only natural sounds. It means that if you listen to our sounds of rain, it will be the sounds of real rain. You can check the quality of the sounds at our websute - en.ecosounds.net
release_text: === 1.3.3 === You can create your own sound atmosphere === The application requires the loading of additional 52 megabytes on the first run. Make sure WiFi is connected.

description: Vous souhaitez savoir ou avoir internet en WiFi gratuitement à Paris? Wifi à Paris est l'application qu'il vous faut! Wifi à Paris permet de géolocaliser les points WiFi mis à disposition par la ville de Paris. Wifi in Paris is the application for you! Wifi in Paris can geotag WiFi points provided by the city of Paris. Features: - Search Global WiFi - Search access points closest to its position - Search access points closest to an address - Added WiFi Personal hostpots - Visualization of WiFi access points on a map - Ability to navigate to the equipment - Backup & Recovery his personal points - Interface for Ice Cream Sandwich phones than Android 2.1 - Language: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese Upcoming Features: - Put in favorite hostpots In case of problems or translations to help improve them, thank you contact me by email ;) If you like the application, please do not hesitate to comment! ;) To make a donation: http://bit.ly/Y4NZu4 Follow the news of the application - On the website: http://bit.ly/Lbnmcr - On Facebook: http://on.fb.me/NMvkLJ - On Twitter: http://bit.ly/LDikX3 Keywords: paris, wifi, equipment, mobility, hotspot

description: Cribbage is a card game for two players or up to four, using a standard 52 card pack. Cards rank KQ J10....32A. The objective of the game is for a player to score 121 points before the other and win the game. Before the game starts each player draws a card. The player draws a lower card deals first and each player takes turn to be the dealer in successive hands. The loser of the game is to be the dealer in the next game. The game then proceeds as follow :- 1) The dealer deals 6 cards face down to each player one at a time. The remaining cards are placed face down as stock. 2) Each player discards two cards face down to form the crib. The crib will count for the dealer. Therefore the non-dealer will try to discard two cards to form a crib least valuable to the dealer. 3) The non-dealer cuts a card in the face down stock and place it face up on the top of the stock. The face up card is called the “start” card. If the start card is a Jack, the dealer gains two points. 4) The non-dealer start to place a card from his/her hand face up in front of his/herself. Ace is counted as one, all picture cards are counted as ten, all number cards are counted as their face value. And then each player takes turn to play this step. 5) A player has to stop placing a card face up and say “Go” when all the face up cards of both players add up to 31, or will exceed 31 if to place another card face up. If after placing a card and all the face up cards add up to exactly 31, the player gain two points. 6) A player who cannot place a card since it will exceed 31 has to pass for its opponent to play. If the opponent can neither place a card, the player who places its last card gains one point. All the face up cards are then turned over and placed aside. 7) The opponent of the player who placed the last card repeats playing from step 4. If he or she has no card left on hand, then the other player keeps on playing from step 4 until there is no card on hand. 8) You can gain more points during the play as follow :- 8.1) You gain 2 points if you play a card and the total face up cards add up to 15. 8.2) You gain 2 points if you play a card which has the same rank as the previous face up card ( Pair). 8.3) You gain 6 points if you play a card which has the same rank as the previous pair of face up cards (Pair Royal). 8.4) You gain 12 if you play a card which has the same rank as the previous three face up cards (Double Pair Royal). 8.5) You gain points if you play a card which can form a set of running cards with the previous cards such as you play 7 and the previous two cards are 8 and 6 or 6 and 8. The points gained are equal to the number of running cards in this case 3. And if your opponent plays a card of 9, he/she gains 4 points. 9) When both players have no card on hand, there is another round of scoring points from their played cards combined with the start card. The scoring starts first with the non-dealer according to a set of rules such as :- a) Any combination of card add up to 15 scores 2 point for each combination. For example if your hand has card K Q 5 3 2 the card combinations which add up to 15 are K 5, K 3 2, Q 5, Q 3 2. therefore you gain 8 points. b) Three cards of consecutive rank (irrespective of suit), such as A 2 3, score 3 points for a run. A hand such as 6 7 7 8 scores 12 points:- 3 points of 6 7 x 8 , 3 points from 6 x 7 8, 4 point from x 7 x 8 ( add up 15) and x x 7 8, 2 points from x 7 7 x. 10) Then the dealer scores point from his/her hand similarly as step 9. 11) Finally the dealer displays the four cards in the crib and scores them with the start card. The scoring is similar to step 9.1 to step 9.3. If only all four cards in the crib have the same suit with the start card, then the dealer gain 5 points. 12) As soon as a player's score reaches or exceeds 121 at any stage of the game, he/she wins the game and the game ends.

description: The Loan Calculator helps you to calculate the EMI (Equated monthly Instalment) or Tenure or Loan Amount or Interest Rate of home Loan, Car Loan. It also shows loan repayment schedule with total interest paid and total principal amount paid at the end of every financial year. Main Features - Loan EMI Calculation - Loan Compare tool to compare 2 different loans - Calculate the affordable loan amount based on the affordable EMI. - Loan Refinance - Loan Repayment Schedule - Calculate EMI or Tenure or Loan Amount or Interest Rate by entering other three values. - Total interest paid and total principal amount paid at the end of every financial year. - Send SMS - Send Email Message - Send Repayment schedule as email attachment. - Total Amount Paid added - Currency Symbol. - Change start month of Financial Year. - Settings for Default Values - Tenure & Interest Rate, Currency Symbol, Reload Last Values - Customized start month of financial year. Example Loan Amount: 2,500,000 Loan Tenure (Months): 240 Interest Rate (%): 10.5 Total Amount Paid: 5,990,279 Total Interest Paid: 3,490,279 EMI: 24,959 Please send your suggestion and issues to my E-mail address nilesh.harde@gmail.com
release_text: Version: 4.2 - Hindi language support - Down Payment and Processing Fee fields - Loan Refinance Calculator - Loan Compare tool to compare 2 different loans - Grand total of interest, principal and payment - Calculate EMI or Tenure or Loan Amount or Interest Rate - Total Amount Paid - Total interest Paid - Loan Repayment Schedule - Total interest paid and total principal amount paid at the end of every financial year. - Send SMS, Email Message with Repayment schedule and Share with other apps

description: FINALLY, USE YOUR PHONE OR TABLET LIKE A COMPUTER AND RUN BROWSERS, TEXT EDITORS, MAPS AND MORE SIDE BY SIDE * This is the tablet version, see phone version for SMS support! Multiscreen Multitasking is 10 apps in one. This is the closest you'll get to a Windows 8 style 'desktop mode' on your Android, or to the multitasking features on the S3 or Note 2. This doesn't run any app in a window unfortunately - that's not possible due to the way Android is programmed - but it is the closest alternative. This app includes a unique browser, notepad, drawpad, map and more, and each can be resized and dragged around the screen so you can do more than one thing at once. You can also run a number of web apps including Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, GMail etc. or open widgets in windows too. Best of all? All the apps are interconnected - you can open a website, save it as an image, open it in the drawpad, write on it, then send it to a friend! Feel like you're in Minority Report - tile browsers and read more than one website at once, watch Avengers while reading the news, write an article using Wikipedia as a source, chat on Facebook chat while browsing and listening to music, draw a picture while copying from Google Images, view a place in maps while browsing the web, or open up a text document at the same time as the browser in order to take notes on what you're reading. Create folders to organise your files and edit them on the fly in pop-up windows. Send messages and check your e-mail without needing to stop browsing.... Features Include: * Desktop wallpaper = phone wallpaper * Word count * Spell check * Video player * PDF viewer - 2 PDFs at once! * Browser favourites * Shortcuts on desktop * Edit HTML in text editor and view changes in the browser * View source * Save websites as images and edit them * Easily share drawings/text documents/web links and more * Find on page for browser * Browse and preview files * Edit, cut, rename, delete and create new files with the file manager! * Drawing/doodling pad * Open widgets in windows * Maps * Music player * Find and Replace * Up to three browsers and two editors on screen at once * Resizeable windows * Edit photos and add filters like blur, posterise etc. * Double tap to maximize * Drag to the side to clip to half the screen * Zoom for both browser and text editor * Send e-mails from the editor Many more features are coming soon - please support this app if you want to see camera, games, browser tabs, calculator, spreadsheet, and other functions added more quickly! If you have any requests please get in touch. There are so many cool updates coming, please stick with this app! If you have any suggestions or problems then please E-MAIL me. I am eager to help and to make this app the best it possibly can be, but I need your help and feedback to do so :-)

Belledonne Communications today announced the new release of Linphone for Android. Linphone is an open source internet phone or Voice Over IP phone (VoIP), compatible with the SIP protocol. It was the very first open-source linux application using SIP and it has became one of the most popular open-source SIP dialer for mobile platforms. The new version V2.0 for Android, iPhone and iPad, available immediately, includes significant enhancements in the new ergonomic shape with a curved face interface, the integration of the address book and an account creation assistant. Three major new capabilities have been added : a text messaging feature (chat) with delivery status notification, multiple calls and audio conferencing. In addition, Linphone supports now audio with speex , G711 ,ILBC, GSM, SILK, G722, OPUS, and video with VP8 codec. Exit button is located in the Settings->About page.
release_text: - Improved file transfer features to allow multiple downloads simultaneously - Advanced video size and framerate settings. - Bug fixes

Приложение для любителей кино. С его помощью можно узнать, что идёт в кинотеатрах, выбрать удобный сеанс и купить билет. К вашим услугам рейтинги фильмов и отзывы зрителей, информация о людях из мира кино, интервью и фоторепортажи. В приложении: - расписание кинотеатров России, Украины, Беларуси и Казахстана; - трейлеры и кадры из фильмов; - информация об актёрах и режиссёрах; - рейтинги популярных и ожидаемых фильмов; - график премьер и выхода DVD&Blu-Ray; - новости кино, статьи и репортажи; - напоминания о премьерах; - покупка билетов в кино. Для зарегистрированных пользователей: - добавление фильмов в папку «Буду смотреть»; - синхронизация с сервисом «Мои фильмы» на сайте КиноПоиск; - возможность ставить оценки фильмам и кинотеатрам; - сохранение любимых кинотеатров в «Избранном». The application for movie lovers. Use it to find out what goes in theaters, choose a convenient session and buy a ticket. It features movie ratings and reviews from the audience, information about people from the world of movies, interviews and photo reports. In the application: - The schedule of cinemas in Russia, Ukraine, Belarus and Kazakhstan; - Trailers and images from movies; - Information about the actors and directors; - Ratings popular and anticipated films; - Prime graph and output DVD & Blu-Ray; - Movie News, articles and reports; - A reminder of the premiers; - The purchase of movie tickets. For registered users: - Adding movies to the folder "I will watch"; - Synchronization with the service "My movies" online kinopoisk; - The ability to put the assessment of films and cinemas; - Save your favorite cinema in "Favorites".

description: Первый универсальный справочник врача (новости медицины, справочник лекарств (полный и бесплатный), МКБ, МЭС, медицинские калькуляторы). Подробности читайте ниже: Вы опытный доктор и цените каждую минуту? Молодой врач-ординатор в поисках необходимой информации? Студент медицинского ВУЗа, который хочет стать ближе к клинике? Тогда это приложение для вас, всегда под рукой будут: • Федеральная электронная медицинская библиотека (ФЭМБ)* (доступ к 23 840 публикациям медицинской тематики (клинические рекомендации, книги, диссертации и многое другое) Процесс наполнения библиотеки продолжается (некоторые книги могут некорректно отображаться, просим отнестись с пониманием) • Поиск по базе медицинских публикаций PubMed c возможностью скачать и использовать бесплатные материалы • Справочник лекарств* (120.000 наименований, обновление от марта 2015г, не требует подключения к интернету, распаковка базы на устройстве длится от 30 секунд до 4х минут) • Справочник анализов* (полный и бесплатный справочник анализов. Содержит 442 лабораторных показателя. Не требует интернет соединения для работы) • Справочник TNM • Справочник кодов хирургических операций с кодами КСГ • Свежие новости медицины • Коды МКБ; • Протоколы лечения; • Протоколы диагностики; • Требования к выздоровлению и сроки пребывания пациента в стационаре; • Набор медицинских калькуляторов (74 шт). Упростите свою повседневную работу, экономьте время на получении необходимой информации. Нам доверяют более 150.000 тысяч врачей, присоединяйтесь к ним прямо сейчас. Приложение будет полезно врачам, специалистам по статистическому учету лечебных учреждений, студентам и ординаторам медицинских ВУЗов. Сотрудники ООО "МИР" рады помогать врачам в их ежедневной тяжелой работе. *При реализации проекта использовались средства государственной поддержки, выделенные в качестве гранта в соответствии c распоряжением Президента Российской Федерации от 17.01.2014 № 11-рп и на основании конкурса, проведенного Обществом «Знание» России The first universal directory of physician (medical news, drug reference (full and free), ICD, MES, medical calculators). For details, read below: Are you an experienced doctor and appreciate every minute? Young doctor-intern in the search for the information you need? Medical students who want to get closer to the clinic? Then this is the app for you, always at hand are: • Federal electronic medical library (FEMB) * (access to 23,840 publications medical subjects (clinical guidelines, books, theses, and more) The process of filling the library continues (some books may not display correctly, please treat with understanding) • Search the database of medical publications PubMed c ability to download and use the free materials • Medication Guide * (120,000 items, update of March 2015, does not require an internet connection, unpacking database on the device lasts from 30 seconds to 4 minutes) • Manual tests * (full and free guide analyzes. Contains 442 laboratory parameters. Does not require Internet connection to work) • Directory TNM • Reference code surgical DRG codes • Recent medical news • ICD codes; • Treatment protocols; • Minutes of the diagnosis; • Requirements for the recovery and the timing of hospital stay; • A set of medical calculators (74 pieces). Simplify your daily work, save time to obtain the necessary information. We are trusted by more than 150,000 thousands of doctors, join them now. The application will be useful to doctors, specialists in statistical accounting treatment institutions, students and residents of medical schools. Employees of LLC "MIR" are happy to help physicians in their daily hard work. * When the project funds were used state support allocated as a grant under c order of the President of the Russian Federation of 17.01.2014 № 11-rp on Based on the competition held by the Company "Knowledge" of Russia

description: Obtén toda la información de tu consumo de internet Telcel en una sola aplicación. Telcel ha desarrollado una aplicación que podrás descargar en tu celular o computadora con la cual podrás saber el consumo de Internet que has realizado de tu Plan de datos o Paquete de Internet que hayas contratado. Esta aplicación te permitirá tener un mayor conocimiento sobre la navegación que realizas ya que podrás saber la cantidad de Megabytes que tienes disponibles en el momento de la consulta. La aplicación Consumo de Internet Telcel muestra la siguiente información: - Nombre del Paquete de Internet contratado. - Una gráfica con el porcentaje de MB Consumidos vs. MB incluidos en su paquete (en el caso de un paquete ilimitado esto es igual a los MB definidos en su Política de Uso Justo). - Los MB incluidos en el Paquete de Internet. - Los MB consumidos al día de la consulta. - Los MB disponibles al día de la consulta. - Fecha y hora de la consulta. - Vigencia del Paquete de Internet. - Seccion Roaming para compra de paquetes y consulta de MB. - Contador en tiempo real de los MB consumidos por el usuario. - Las ubicaciones de Centros de Atención a Clientes y STT. Consideraciones: - La aplicación solo está disponible para usuarios de Planes de Renta Mensual y Paquetes Internet Telcel Amigo y Mixtos. - Esta aplicación solo funciona y puede ser descargada a través de la Red Telcel, no está disponible para redes celulares o Wi-Fi de otros Operadores. Get all the information from your Internet consumption Telcel in one application. Telcel has developed an application that you can download to your phone or computer to which the consumer will know that you have made Internet from your data plan or Internet Package you signed. This application will allow you to have a better understanding of the navigation can perform as Megabytes know how much you have available at the time of the query. The Consumer Internet application Telcel displays the following information: - Package Name hired Internet. - A graph with percent vs. MB Consumed MB included in the package (in the case of an unlimited package that is equal to the MB defined in the Fair Use Policy). - The MB included in the package online. - The MB consumed per day of consultation. - The MB available the day of the consultation. - Date and time of the query. - Effective Package Internet. - Section Roaming for purchasing packages and consulting MB. - Real-time counter of the MB consumed by the user. - The locations of Customer Service Centers and STT. Considerations: - The application is only available for users of Monthly Income Plans and Packages Internet Telcel Amigo and mixed. - This application only works and can be downloaded through the Telcel network, unavailable for cellular networks or other Wi-Fi operators.

description: LogMaster is a travel log(mileage log or Vehicle Log) application for Android. It can be used for tracking travel logs for multiple vehicles and for logging trips. The app is a designed to record travel logs similar to a logbook. LogMaster can select Event description from Google Calendar thus allowing for quick entry of travel log. LogMaster is designed to be easy to use and to record vehicle logs quickly. The vehicle logs can be viewed in the application or can be emailed. Log entry stores Kilometers(Kms)/Miles and the duration.
release_text: Added Google Calendar support. Notes can now be selected from Google calendar event description. Some bug fixes.

description: T'es un vrai fan de rap et de hip hop ? Cette app est faîte pour toi ! The French Rap Board t'apporte sur un plateau les meilleurs punchlines de tes rappeurs préférés. De Kery James à Orelsan en passant par Akhenaton, retrouve toutes les grandes figures du rap français dans une seule et même application ! ☆ 60+ rappeurs et 75+ punchlines ☆ Possibilité de jouer plusieurs punchlines en simultané ☆ Vérification des mises à jour à chaque lancement ✓ Garanti sans pub, app 100% gratuite You're a fan of rap and hip hop? This app is made for you! The French Rap Board brings you on a platter the best punchlines of your favorite rappers. Kery James Orelsan through Akhenaton, find all the great figures of French rap in a single application! ☆ 60 + 75 + rappers and punchlines ☆ Ability to play multiple simultaneous punchlines ☆ Check for updates every time you start ✓ Guaranteed no ads, app 100% free

Calculate Distance, Time, and Pace, Calories Burned, and predictions using Peter Riegel’s formula. Enter in two values from your Distance, Time, Pace and you can use this App to calculate the third. Easily calculate and compare between Miles, Kilometers, Meters, and Yards. Using this information the App will automatically calculate your Speed in MPH and KPH, Calories Burned and your predictions using Peter Riegel’s formula. Additionally each time you press one of the calculate buttons a record of it is stored in your history. This is a great feature as it allows you to keep track of weeks worth of workouts and training plans. The History will record the Date/Time, your Distance, Time, and Pace. To access your history go to the Calculate Tab, press the menu button, and select History. Formulas Used: Calories = Kilograms * Kilometers * 1.036 Peter Riegel’s formula: T2=T1*(D2/D1)^1.06

description: Sculpt a 3D virtual clay ball by pushing and pulling it with your fingers. Many different tools are available for easy modeling : draw, grab, smooth, flatten, paint, symmetry, ... Dare anything thanks to the undo-redo and the standard ".obj" save format. Zoom and pan with two fingers. Imagine something, sculpt it, and share with others. You'll enjoy this simplified tactile modeling experience inspired by the sculpture mode of Blender and ZBrush. Look at them if you want to get more serious. Last but not least, this sofware is free, open source, and without any annoying ad ! If you want to improve it, feel free to join the project.

Mobile application of Nova Poshta will allow You to get quick access to the information that helps making the service of express delivery of shipments within the Ukraine even easier and more comfortable. In the application You will find: ✓ current directory of all branches of Nova Poshta; ✓ list of information centers phone numbers; ✓ working hours of all branches; ✓ schedules of shipping goods on the same day and schedules of shipments arrival to the branches; ✓ Company news, information about new services and opening of new branches. This application will help You implement: ✓ Quick Search – helps You find the address of any branch in the Ukraine, and to choose the nearest one to Your current location within a radius of 1 km, 3 km or 10 km; ✓ View the location of the branch on the map showing major reference points for quick search; ✓ calculate of the cost and time of delivery; ✓ track the parcel using a tracking number. This application is available in Russian and Ukrainian.

description: OBD II App that will communicate with your Toyota Engine ECU vehicles. This app requires ELM 327 Bluetooth (See Below). It will Read Enhance/Extended PIDS (130 PIDS). Vendors Type: CHX, OBDII, BAFX Bluetooth Device tested OK.

description: ★★★★/5 - JayisGames Having a rough day? Has life got you stressed? Well, here at JIG, we know that nothing relieves tension quite like a good old fashioned physics puzzler chock full of explosions!!! The latest effort from Keybol, allows you to take your frustrations out on adorable bursting blocks that look at you as if to say, "It's okay! Go ahead and destroy us, we love you." An easy to play but challenging physics puzzle game. Remove all the blocks from the screen and make sure the stars will stay. Enjoy!

description: I have fun with faces engages young children in learning about a topic that is instantly meaningful … the face. They can have fun singing along to a well-known song about the face; finding, labelling and creating the parts of the face; listening to and reading stories about the face; and, doing harder and harder jigsaws of all types of faces. The visually appealing activities are supported by audio which engages, guides and encourages the user. The four activities develop early literacy, numeracy and ICT skills for children in the year prior to school and the first year of school.

description: Learn Morse Code (CW) for ham radio and practice another mode of operation. AE Morse is a Droid application that teaches you Morse code (CW). It has an interactive screen for learning the alphabet plus much more. The best way to learn Morse code is by ear. AE Morse plays actual Morse code sound instead of just blinking or vibrating your Droid. Learn Morse Code (CW) for ham radio and practice another mode of operation. AE Morse does not contain dot and dash charts. This is because if you learn by using dot and dash charts, you will probably not progress above 10 words per minute. This is because you have to translate the sound to dots and dashes and then the alphabet character received. Trust me! The author of this app used dot and dash charts and had to unlearn them before actually learning Morse code by ear. Learn by listening. Morse code should never be learned visually. AE Morse Tutor is only recommended for anyone who wants to learn CW. It is not recommended for someone who already knows CW at 20 words per minute or more. AE Morse Tutor should be used on Android 2.0 or higher. If any issues occur, rather than leave negative feedback, please contact me within 48 hours, and I will work with you, or refund the purchase price. My name is Jerry and I have held an amateur radio license for over 30 years. I have loved communicating using Morse Code (CW) and wanted to provide a learning tool for anyone who is new to amateur radio and interested in using CW to enhance his or her amateur radio experience. CW can successfully be received under some conditions where voice can not. You can tune out more of the interference on a received CW message using a decent ham radio. Having the skill of CW can be an asset during emergency situations where other forms of communication may not be possible.

Multimedia-Tour guide with Topo maps for the european alpine region. GPS-Tracks for Android is designed for the application at hiking, theme trails, GEO-caching, cycling, snow trail tours, ski tours, MTB, site seeing tours, etc. Runs on: All Android-Phones from version 2.1. Attention: If the App is moved to the background, the GPS-receiving continues. This can quickly discharge the battery. Features: - Original, free Topo maps from scale 1:25'000 for Switzerland, Germany and Austria. Openstreetmaps and Opencyclemaps for worldwide use. - Complete footpath, cycling and further networks to overlay the maps. Examples: footpath network Switzerland, cycling network Switzerland and South Germany, .... - «Top of»-routes: Integrated Tour-guide with over 7500 professional created routes in the field of hiking, theme trails, cycling, mountainbike, ski tours, snow trail tours, transalp, etc. Following the principle: just the best routes of the region! - Over 250'000 Points of interests, like hotels, museums, sights, ... – provided by our tourism-partners. - Routing via leisure-path networks e.g. from point A to point B via footpaht network. - Free text search in all databases. E.g. for mountain names, locations, addresses, etc. Alignment oft he map on these points. - Recording of your own routes and waypoints and saving them on the phone or on www.GPS-Tracks.com. - Revolutionary: With a free account on www.GPS-Tracks.com you can plan your routes (using the whole assortment of Topo- and satellite maps) and transfer them to the phone without any installation of software or maps. You do not need to connect the phone to the computer. Plan routes unlimitedly and recall them anytime and anywhere. - All routes, POI's and maps can be saved on the phone (in case there is no telephone connection on the way). - Simple user guidance: without initial effort or previous knowledge easily operated. Important: - All data can be saved on the phone. You can e.g. transfer data at home on a WiFi network to your phone and hence will be independent of a data connection on the way. If additional data is loaded through the internet connection on the way, we recommend to open a data subscription at your telecommunications provider. 30 MB per month are enough for that purpose. For a route Tour incl. all map data approx. 3 MB are loaded. This App and its content were developed with the support from i.a.: - Adelboden / Frutigen Tourismus - Allgäu Tourismus - Brigels Tourismus - Colltex Skihaftfelle - Chur Tourismus - Davos Klosters Tourismus - Swiss Cyling - Schweizerischer Radfahrerbund - Engadin- St.Moritz Tourismus - Entlebuch Unesco Biospärenreservat - Fribourg Tourismus - Heidiland Tourismus - Jungfrau-Tourismus - Vierwaldstättersee / Lakeluzern.ch Tourismus - Lenzerheide Tourismus - Liechtenstein Tourismus - Luzern Tourismus - Schweizerischer Alpen-Club SAC - Schaffhauserland Tourismus - St.Gallen Business Location - Meiringen-Hasliberg - Regiun Surselva - Ticino Tourismus - Viamala Tourismus - Region Willisau - Stadt Winterthur - Zürichsee Tourismus - Zug Tourismus - Bad Zurzach
release_text: - Free storage of SwissTopo maps on mobile phone for day trips. - Possibility of storing SwissTopo maps on mobile phone with bulk download (for less money). - Tours by QR code on mobile phone loaded. - All tours and POIs are stored and synchronized in the cloud of GPS-Tracks.com. - Direct input Hallwag, Kümmerly und Frey card codes - Ability to delete multiple maps simultaneously.

Primarily for converting between number bases, but also with simple calculator functions and the advantage of showing simultaneously the same number in Decimal, Octal, Hex, Binary and ASCII. ADW Launcher Theme Pink Heart Black Crown It is an ADW-THEME which requires the latest ADW-LAUNCHER application be installed. The ADW-theme includes six wallpapers, alarm clock and icon package. After installation of the Theme please press button "Open". It will forward you to the Market to download and install free version of the ADW launcher provided it is not already installed. To Use the Theme: Start ADW-launcher. Press Menu, choose ADW Settings and then Themes Preferences. Choose the Theme and apply it. Long press on any application icon on your desktop. "Custom shortcut" menu will popup. Press on the icon picture once more, then select ADWTheme icon pack, and choose any icon you like for your application. To Change the Wallpaper: Long press on the desktop, choose "Wallpapers" and then the Themes wallpaper. Scroll among three wallpapers, select and press "Set wallpaper". If after the theme installation wallpaper looks slightly blurred please choose wallpaper chooser to reset it. To Open the Alarm Clock: Long press the desktop, choose "Widgets" and then the Themes alarm clock It is very useful to watch youtube video about the Theme.

description: **REAL TEACHER TAUGHT LESSONS** Pre-Algebra This course teaches students to expand number sense to understand, perform operations, and solve problems with rational numbers. Pre-Algebra is taken by students as a first introduction to the concepts and skills needed to be successful in Algebra and higher math. Chapter 1 Algebra Expressions and Integers 1.1 Variables and Expressions 1.2 Order of Operations 1.3 Writing and evaluating expressions 1.4 Integers and Absolute Value 1.5 Adding Integers 1.6 Subtracting Integers 1.7 Inductive Reasoning 1.8 Reasoning Strategy Look for a Pattern 1.9 Multiply and Dividing Integers 1.10 The Coordinate Plane 1.11 Plane for problem Solving 1.12 Variables and Expressions and Properties 1.13 Problem Solving - Work Backwards Chapter 2 Solving One Step Equations and Inequalities 2.1 Properties of Numbers 2.2 The Distributive Properties 2.3 Simplifying Algebraic Equations 2.4 Variables and Equations 2.5 Solving Equations using Adding and Subtracting 2.6 Solving Equations using Multiplication and Division 2.7 Reasoning Strategy Try Test Revise 2.8 Inequalities and their Graphs 2.9 Solving Inequalities by Adding and Subtracting 2.10 Solving Inequalities by Multiplication and Division Chapter 3 Decimals and Equations 3.1 Rounding and Estimating 3.2 Estimating Decimal Products and Quotients 3.3 Mean Median Mode 3.4 Using Formulas 3.5 Solve Equations by Adding and Subtracting Decimals 3.6 Solve Equations by Multiplying and Dividing Decimals 3.7 Using the Metric System 3.8 Reasoning Strategy Act it Out Chapter 4 Factors, Fractions, and Exponents 4.1 Divisibility and Factors 4.2 Exponents 4.3 Prime Factorization and Greatest Common Numbers 4.4 Simplify Fractions 4.5 Reasoning Strategy Solve a Simpler problem 4.6 Rational Numbers 4.7 Exponents and Multiplication 4.8 Exponents and Division Chapter 5 Operations with Fractions 5.1 Comparing Rational Numbers 5.2 Fractions and Decimals 5.3 Add and Subtract Fractions 5.4 Multiply and Divide Fractions 5.5 Using Customary Units of Measure 5.6 Reasoning Strategy Work Backwards 5.7 Solve by Adding and Subtracting Fractions 5.8 Solving Equations by Multiplying Fractions 5.9 Powers of Products and Quotients Chapter 6 Ratios, Proportions, and Percents 6.1 Ratios and Rates 6.2 Proportions 6.3 Similar Figures and Scale Drawings 6.4 Probability 6.5 Fractions Decimals Percents 6.6 The Percent Equations 6.7 Percents and Equations 6.8 Precents of Change 6.9 Mark-up and Discount 6.10 Problem Solving - Make a Table Chapter 7 Solving Equations and Inequalities 7.1 Solving Two Step Equations 7.2 Solving Muti-step Equations 7.3 Two-step equations with Fractions and Decimals 7.4 Reasoning Strategy Write an Equation 7.5 Solving Equations with Variables on both sides 7.6 Solving Two-step Inequalities 7.7 Transforming Formulas 7.8 Simple and Compound Interest Chapter 8 Linear Functions and Graphing 8.1 Relations and Functions 8.2 Equations with two variables 8.3 Slope and Y- Intercept 8.4 Writing Rules for Functions 8.5 Scatter Plot 8.6 Reasoning Strategy Draw a Graph 8.7 Solve systems of Equations 8.8 Graphing Linear Inequalities Chapter 9 Spatial Thinking 9.1 Points Lines and Planes 9.2 Angle Relationship and Parallel Lines 9.3 Classifying Polygons 9.4 Reason Strategy Draw a Diagram 9.5 Congruence 9.6 Circles 9.7 Constructions 9.8 Translations 9.9 Symmetry and Reflections 9.10 Rotations Chapter 10 Area and Volume 10.1 Area of a Parallelogram 10.2 Area of a Triangles and Trapezoids 10.3 Area of Circles 10.4 Space Figures 10.5 Surface Area of Prisms and Cylinders 10.6 Surface Area of Pyramids, Cones and Spheres 10.7 Volume of Prisms and Cylinders 10.8 Problem Solving - Make Model 10.9 Volume of Pyramids, Cones and Spheres And 4 more chapters with 8 lessons each Chapter 11 Right Angles in Algebra Chapter 12 Data Analysis and Probability

Maybe the most feature-rich and challenging implementation of the classic Dots and Boxes game on Google Play. This application offers very challenging Artificial Intelligence as well as many other features. The AI in the advanced difficulty levels is able to predict and anticipate the next moves. Also the application is very lightweight with the apk size not exceeding the 1.5MB. Features: 1) Play against friends or against computer. 2) Clever Artificial Intelligence which anticipates future moves. 3) Four AI difficulty levels: very-easy,easy, medium, hard. The AI is well designed with each next level being a bit harder than the previous level. 4) Multiple board sizes (from 3x3 dots to 12x12) 5) Ability to choose player name and your favourite colour 6) Quick match. No irritating menus just hit the launch icon and you are inside the action. ( Of course after entering the application you have the ability to select your favourite settings by hitting the MENU button. Your preferences will be saved so you won't have to change them each time you open the application. ) 7) Ability to set the game speed. 3 game speed level : slow, normal, fast. Fast level is appropriate for experienced player, slow is more appropriate for people who just started playing dots and boxes. 8) Statistics section for viewing your results against the computer 9) Ability to share your statistics and end-game screenshots with friends 10) Undo button For those who don't know the game To be good in the game you must have good observation skills and be able to predict the opponent's moves. So are you ready to take the challenge?? The rules are 1) Touch in between two dots to mark a line (vertical or horizontal). Your goal is to complete a four side box. 2) The player that completes a four side box has the oportunity to play one more time. 3) The player that will complete the most boxes wins the game. Enjoy!
release_text: Version 2.2 Fixed a bug which causes application not be displayed correctly when started in landscape orientation. Version 2.1 Increased the maximum board size to 12. Reduced application size by 50% Version 2.0 Added undo button

description: First Aid Dental Trauma - Knowledge is lacking among the general population in how to take care of a dental trauma at the scene of an accident. What to do when the tooth is loose? When several teeth are damaged or misplaced? What if it is primary teeth? For a totally knocked out tooth your first aid could be of vital importance to save the tooth. The Dental Trauma app will help parents, teachers, sport coaches and others to give the best first aid to persons suffering from Dental Trauma. This app shows what to do, and if a visit to a dentist could be delayed or not, when a fragment of the crown is fractured, when there is increased mobility or dislocation of a tooth, or in case of a completely knocked out tooth. It is a great medical guide informing what actions to take at the scene of a dental accident. This app is endorsed by IADT (International Association of Dental Traumatology) Keywords: dental trauma, dental trauma app, tooth injury app, dental injury app, tooth trauma app, tooth accident app, dental accident app, traumatic tooth injury app dental trauma first aid, dental first aid app
release_text: -Fixed an issue with Arabic not being right adjusted

Start meal planning with the eMeals app, which provides: * Your choice of over 50 meal plan options * Weekly meal plan that features 7 new dinner recipes * Organized grocery list for easy shopping * In-store sales featured in recipes for store specific meal plans * Ability to customize your grocery list by skipping meals and adding items Tailor your meal plan to your food style by choosing from any of these: * Classic Meals * Clean Eating * Gluten Free * Low Carb * Low Fat * Natural & Organic * Paleo * Portion Control * Simple Gourmet * Slow Cooker * Vegetarian eMeals is a comprehensive meal planning resource that helps provide healthy and delicious dinners for busy families and individuals. Endorsed by financial guru Dave Ramsey and highlighted in the Oprah Winfrey blog, the eMeals weekly dinner plans include grocery shopping lists and recipe instructions that are simple and easy to follow. Download today and take the stress out of planning, shopping and cooking delicious, homemade meals.
release_text: • Activate Cook Mode for a clean, readable set of step-by-step instructions. • Quickly view the recipe’s ingredients by touching the View Ingredients tab at the bottom of Cook Mode. • Support for more devices. • Bug fixes.

description: This is an application for learning english with true or auto captions by videos, more than 13000 videos and 500 playlists which are classified orderly for common topics in English such as: 1. Learning vocabulary by new videos updated everyday with true subtitle. 2. Practice english examination Toeic, Ielts, Toeft. Every subject includes a famous series of videos for writing, speaking, listening, reading. Also, application provides a series of well-known channels for learning english such as australian network, english ryan, academic english help... 3. Practice english skills as speaking, listening, writing, reading, vocabulary, grammar. 4. Practice english by news with bbc, voa, and english for business. 5. Learning english by famous songs ,series of films. In addition, the application also provides some features as following: - Display subtitles of videos support user learning english easily. - Practice listening each sentence in subtitle, - With feature speaking, the application supports to rate the user's voice. - Or user can record his voice to practice pronunciation. - Taking notes and add video to favorite. - Add favorite playlists. - Search videos and playlists. Besides that, everyday you can receive new videos involving many things such as learning english by: - Blockbusters - Famous persons - Hot news - Popular songs. - ... Hope to help you learning English effectively. Thanks. ------------------------------- DISCLAIMER ------------------------------- All videos are available in YouTube and our app just provides links and streams from YouTube only for those for which embedding is allowed by uploader. This App only provides a convenient access to Youtube videos, this App does not own the ownership of any video hosted on Youtube. All videos linked in this App are hosted by the public third-party media service, YouTube. All trademarks and copyrights are belonging to the respective owners who upload videos to Youtube.

description: A fun 5th Grade games app with an easy-to-follow 5th Grade curriculum! Includes algebra, geometry, fractions, language arts, science, & geography. 5th Grade lessons have never looked so fun! Plus, we feature the top 100 students every day! Kids learn 5th Grade lessons playing on their own, with friends, or with other kids around the world. Parents can view their child’s scores as well as the time they’ve spent playing. This 5th Grade games app includes: •5th Grade Algebra •5th Grade Geography •5th Grade Geometry and Fractions •5th Grade Language Arts (spelling, adjectives, adverbs, noun, pronoun, analogies, grammar) •5th Grade Measurement and Data •5th Grade Reading (writing and reading comprehension, cause / effect, story elements) •5th Grade Science •5th Grade US History •5th Grade Vocabulary Let’s Leap Ahead features the best-selling line of educational books sold in North America. Our 5th Grade games app and other educational apps have quickly become the most sought-after educational programs by parents and teachers nationwide!

description: Home Remedies and recipes for you to use today. Download today to see what remedies we have to offer. Home Remedies MD is a mobile application that is based around providing natural treatments to help get rid of the must common illnesses that people experience. We strive to blend great information with a little bit of social interaction to keep our audience engaged in our content. Editorial Team HomeRemediesMD.com is lead by a diverse group of editors with combined experience in health, wellness, fitness, nutrition, parenting, and lifestyle content. Our talented editors have written for several large online health and lifestyle publications. Robin Hale – is an entrepreneur and freelance writer who began researching health and fitness long before the holistic approach or the move towards alternative medicine became popular. She has worked with leading doctors and research analysts to bring clarity to topics such as Type 2 Diabetes, weight loss, and nutrition. Robin believes that the first step toward wellness is a full understanding of how the body operates in certain situations and why it reacts the way it does. With that information, individuals are more able to work with their bodies natural abilities, instead of merely masking symptoms with medication. Rebecca Fein – is the founder of Fein Life Coaching. Rebecca’s greatest joy is watching her clients transform their lives through their relationships. When Rebecca isn’t coaching she enjoys spending time with her husband and also with their dog.Visit http://feinlife.webs.com to download a FREE report called 5 Steps To Starting Over. Sarah Rasheed - Is a 22-year-old college student majoring in sociology with a passion for writing about health and wellness. When Sarah is not actively participating in sports herself, she likes to spend time trying to get children and adults in her community active and participate in sports as well. Jesse Kehrley – Is 26 years old and lives in South Carolina with his wife and three kids. Jesse has a passion for writing and home remedies, and he is active in the autism community to support his two autistic sons. Brett Stewart – is a Certified Personal Trainer and author of several fitness books including 7 Weeks to 50 Pull-Ups and 7 Weeks to Getting Ripped. An ultramarathoner and Ironman, Brett’s passions run deep for endurance sports. Follow him on Twitter @fiftypullups Regina Woodard – ”Originally from Arizona and now living in Denver, Gina is currently a freelance writer for a variety of online publications. Though she is now writing in a professional capacity, her love of writing actually began at an early age. Her website of Spantenna.com is a showcase of her original and fan based creative works.” Katie Mitchell – is a freelance writer living in Grand Rapids, Michigan. She has been writing professionally since 2006, and doing so in the health field since 2007. In addition to writing her interests include history, Ireland, vegetarianism, consumer ethics and yoga.

description: Silences all sounds including Alarm and Media sounds. Quick and easy way to completely silence your phone. If other applications try to change the volume, or if you manually change the volume, a notification will alert you to the change. Perfect for when you need to quickly silence your phone and don't want to have to deal with complicated settings or setting up volume profiles.

This app streams games, programs, or your full desktop from an NVIDIA GameStream-compatible PC on your local network or the Internet (port forwarding is required for Internet streaming - see the instructions below). After initial pairing, Moonlight will show a list of apps to stream from your PC. You can add any other apps to this list through GeForce Experience or stream the full desktop. Mouse, keyboard, and controller input is sent from your Android device to the PC. To have a good experience, you need a mid to high-end wireless router with a good wireless connection to your Android device (5 GHz highly recommended) and a good connection from your PC to your router (Ethernet highly recommended). For advanced setup instructions such as streaming your full desktop, adding custom apps to stream, or if you're having trouble, see the detailed setup guide here: http://tinyurl.com/pjn5k67 If you're streaming over the Internet, you will need to forward ports manually on your router. The specific ports are here: http://tinyurl.com/k6hf2c6 Users using an external mouse will want to use the root version instead which has much better mouse support (no double cursors or screen border issues). See: http://tinyurl.com/moonlight-root If you would like to use a gamepad connected to the PC instead of the Android device and your game isn't detecting it, follow the steps here: http://tinyurl.com/p2hzsrk Disclaimer: This app is not affiliated with NVIDIA Corporation. Please do not contact them for support. Instead, use the XDA forum link at the bottom of the app description. PC Requirements: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 600/700/800/900 series desktop or mobile GPU (GT-series GPUs won't work) NVIDIA GeForce Experience (GFE) 2.2.2 or higher Most controllers will work just fine, but the following have been tested: Xbox 360 wired/wireless Xbox One wired (via Moonlight's built-in USB driver) PS3 wired (with Sixaxis Enabler app) or wireless (with SixAxis Controller app) PS4 wired via USB MOGA controller (see below) MOGA controller users: If your controller has a switch with A and B, it must be switched to B to be used for streaming. If you have no switch, use the MOGA Universal Driver app. Note for SixAxis users: Use SixAxis in "Native Gamepad" mode for Moonlight. The default button mapping needs to be adjusted to match the standard controller layout for streaming. Quick Instructions: 1. Make sure GeForce Experience is open, updated, and that you've scanned for games. If the NVIDIA icon is not shown in your system tray, GeForce Experience will not be able to pair. You may need to reinstall GFE to be able to use Moonlight. 2. In most cases, your PC will show up automatically in the PC list. Click the entry in the PC list to start pairing. If not, click the plus button and add your PC using its IP address. If this doesn't work, try the troubleshooting steps below. 3. On your PC, enter the PIN displayed on the Android device and accept the pairing dialog. If you don't see a pairing dialog, try the troubleshooting steps below. 4. Choose your PC in the PC list and the app list will be displayed where you can select a game to stream. Troubleshooting: A detailed troubleshooting guide is available here: http://tinyurl.com/pjdbx5x If this doesn't resolve your issue, please post on the XDA thread or send me an email. Bluetooth-related streaming issues: Depending on your phone/tablet, you may have a bad streaming experience if Bluetooth is active while streaming. This is a hardware issue due to the antenna wiring. If you experience this, you can try a USB Ethernet adapter or a controller that connects directly to your Android device via USB OTG. For more details and to report issues, see: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2505510 This app is open-source under the GPL. The code can be found here: https://github.com/moonlight-stream/moonlight-android Legal: All trademarks cited here are the property of their respective owners.
release_text: v4.5.2 - Added full mouse capture support (without root) on SHIELD devices using NVIDIA's custom mouse API v4.5.1 - Added support for wired Xbox 360 controllers on devices that don't have built-in support - This feature requires Android 4.4 (KitKat) or later v4.5 - Added simple on-screen controller (can be enabled in settings) - Credits to hop3l3ss on GitHub for the initial implementation - Please let me know if you have ideas for improvements

description: Lunafaqt is an app to render the moon on any specific date and or location. It also calculates the rise and set times for the sun and moon, twilight times, time and date for the next moon phase. If you have an issue, please contact me by emailing me at lunafaqt@gmail.com and i will do everything i can to resolve your issue. Features: - Draws the current phase of the moon with parallactic angle - Swipe left/right to increase/decrease the date by a day - Two homescreen widgets with moon image and rise/set times - Adjustable widget transparency - Location based on GPS or manual coordinates - Coordinate lookup by address, city name, postal code or landmark - Adjustable date and time in 12/24 hour format - Sun rise, set and twilight times for the given location - Moon rise, set and transit times for the given location - Percentage of the moon's visible disk illuminated - Current moon altitude and azimuth in degrees - Moon age and distance to Earth - Current zodiac sign the moon is in - Date and times of the next major phases - Lunar calendar wich shows the phases for one month with indications of the major phases, swipe left/right to change the month - Supports installation to SD card (Note: if installed to SD card, the widgets won't work! This is not a bug but an Android issue. See: http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=8555 ) - Language support for English, Dutch, German, French, Italian, Russian, Czech and Spanish - Ad supported (can be removed with an in-app purchase)
release_text: - Changed sun/moon widget background and padding - Removed 'immersive mode' fullscreen implementation which could cause problems on phones without hardware buttons

description: With Caddy's Electronic Patient Health & Medical Records system (EMR), you can manage and share your patient list as well as patient tasks, notes, medications, records, images, and messages anywhere, anytime. Key features: - Share patient records securely within your healthcare team. - Take medical images of patient wounds and skin rashes. - Manage patient tasks list and assign jobs to healthcare members in your medical team. - Offline access to 125 medical calculators - Records patient problems, family history, and clinical alerts. - Add medications to easily track what your patients are taking. Medical tasks and messaging: - Use the quick tick box list for selecting medical tasks. - Customize the tick box list so you can quickly record patient tasks on ward rounds - Assign tasks within your medical team so everyone knows their plan for the day - Send comments and messages about specific tasks securely and easily. Help is always on hand - Add images to the patient's record and share them with your team Medical notes (EMR) - Records a patient's visit to your health clinic - Never miss an opportunity on ward rounds to write medical notes again Patient list: - Quickly review your patient list - Always know where your patient is located by updating ward and room information - Note demographic information such as date of birth and ethnicity. Other features include: Health & Medical Calculator: - Over 125 medical calculators - Each medical calculator offers healthcare recommendations - Fully referenced calculators - Health & Medical Calculators are constantly updated Drug Reference: - Powered by FDA drug database - Provides drug mechanism of action, drug indications, drug contraindications, physiological effects, and drug interactions Health News: - News from over 10 different health journals and news websites - Stay up to date with the latest trends and clinical breakthroughs - Healthcare news is automatically updated There are now over 500 reviews for Caddy, and while we started out as just a health & medical calculator, we have the goal to create an advanced healthcare record to help clinicians and patients around the world. Want to be involved? E-mail Caddy support. Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CaddyMed

description: Dear Almosaly users, happy new Ramadan Initiation with breezes holy month of Ramadan We are pleased to offer you an important update for your preferred app to be of help to you and those you love, for have better worship and has many new features. • Complete support for Turkish language. • Complete support for German language (Android version only) • Turkish translation for morning , evening and prayer Azkar • German translation for morning , evening and prayer Azkar • Vocal translation for Azkar in English, Turkish and German letters. • Introducing Visual Qibla where you will be able to see Qibla direction to Haram directly on map with your distance to haram and tools for accurate horizontal alignment and magnetic field detection to avoid compass errors • Automatic location detection using GPS, now Almosaly can automatically detect your location and adjust the Prayer Times according to it. • Adjust Prayer Times for many countries like Kuwait, Qatar, Turkey, France, USA, Sweden and many more…, for accurate time. • Add many method of prayer time's calculation to better serve you needs. • Add new Azan sounds with beautiful voices. • Added "A Salat Khayton Men Al Nawm" alert before Fajr. • You can now add/select new Azan voices from iTunes library • Updated Social share plugins AlMosaly is an Islamic prayer reminder app; it's the most important Islamic app for all Muslims all around the world. As it has a very accurate prayer times, Qibla, Fasting, Day – night & prayer' Azkar, Ramadan Emsakia, Calendar and Quran. AlMosaly has two unique features which called "Silent mode during prayer" and" Mosques "which is showing the nearest mosques to your location with a very accurate GBS. Features: 1- Shows prayer times daily or for a whole week with any date you specify. 2- Shows Qibla direction with respect to: North, Sun and Moon direction. 3- GPS is supported to get prayer times or Qibla direction wherever you are. 4- Hijri (Arabic) Calendar and its corresponding Gregorian calendar 5- Ramadan Emsakeya(fajr and sunset) times 6- Quran share alerts, and saving your last read position. 7- Each prayer has its own alerts that you can adjust as you like: Alert for Azan time, before prayer times,and for iqama time . 8- AlMosaly also alerts you for other islamic activities like: evening prayers (qiyam), Duha prayer, Azkar, fasting, Friday alerts, and more activates which important to Islam. 9- You can select your location among thousands of cities all over the world, or you can add your custom location using GPS. 10- We offer "Mosques" screen where you find near mosques to you location on the map with routes to them. 11- On the application main screen we show selected videos for Mecca, Kaaba and Madina views. Keywords: Adhan, Allah, Compass, Mosque, Muslim, athan, hadith, tasbih, alarm, fajr, sahoor, full, book; search, year, dawn, round, calculator, translation, clock, season.
