▣ 자전거 등록/조회 서비스 – 바이크서치 ▣ 사진 찍고, 차대번호만 입력하면 끝! 스마트한 자전거 등록/조회 서비스! 바이크서치(BikeSearch)는 자전거를 등록하고, 조회하고, 도난/분실 신고하는 서비스입니다. (★ 2013 LBS 활용 앱&웹 공모전 방송통신위원회위원장상 수상) [자전거 등록 서비스] - 구입과 함께 찾아오는 자전거 도난/분실의 공포 - 사진 찍고, 차대번호만 입력하면 내 자전거 등록 끝! - 없어진 내 자전거, 불법 유통되는 건 용납 못 해! - 중고 자전거 팔 때도, 안전하게 등록된 자전거니까 OK [자전거 조회 서비스] - 중고 자전거 사고 팔 때, 묻지마 거래는 이제 그만! - 차대번호만 입력하면 자전거 정보와 소유자 정보가 한 번에! - 사고 싶은데, 도난 자전거면 어쩌지? 조회 한 번이면, 걱정 끝! [도난/분실 신고 서비스] - 자전거가 없어진 현장에서 바로, 실시간 도난/분실 신고! - 도난/분실 위치 찍고 시간 입력하면, 바로 도난 자전거 지도에 업데이트! - 현상금 추가 기능으로 내 자전거 빠르게 찾기 시도 - 댓글 제보로 하나되는 우리 동네 자전거 지킴이 서비스 [NFC 태그 서비스] - 특수 제작된 바이크서치 NFC 태그를 자전거에 부착 - 등록된 내 자전거 정보를 바이크서치 NFC 태그에 저장 - 스마트폰만 접촉(NFC 기능 ON)하면 손쉽게 등록 정보 조회 - 중고 자전거 거래 시, 도난/분실 의심 자전거 발견 시 접촉만 하면 뙇! (등록방법 보기) http://youtu.be/fcUAat8QSHc (조회방법 보기) http://youtu.be/OOaWj20nm9o ※ 응? 차대번호가 뭔가요? - 차대번호는 자전거 프레임에 새겨진 고유의 번호로 영어와 숫자 조합으로 이루어져 있습니다. By 9LAB [바이크서치 웹사이트] www.bikesearch.co.kr [바이크서치 페이스북] https://www.facebook.com/bikesearch 추천 TAG ] ------------------------- 바이크서치, bikesearch, 자전거, 자전거등록제, 자전거조회, 차대번호, 도난, 신고, NFC, 태그, 바이크, bike, bicycle, 4대강, 노원구자전거, Tranggle, 트랭글, 에코마일리지, GPS, 속도계, 행복나눔, 두바퀴, mtb, 국토종주, 삼천리, 바이크앤 ---- 개발자 연락처 : info@9lab.kr

With the official FC Red Bull Salzburg App powered by A1 you can receive all the info on the Red Bulls straight on your iPhone! Latest news, videos, fixtures, live match updates, press conferences and the training schedule for the boys are now on hand for you. Plus with user-defined push notifications you will be updated with news and developments as they happen. Should you wish, you can change the language in the settings to read all content in German. CONTENTS - LIVE (Ticker incl. live updates, statistics & line-up) - Real-time PUSH NOTIFICATIONS (Topics: matches, offers, news) - Latest FC Red Bull Salzburg NEWS - VIDEOS incl. live streams of our press conferences - TEAMS (Overview of squads) - SEASON (Fixtures, table, training schedule) - CALENDAR (Save all the fixtures in your calendar with an iCal file) - TICKETS (Match ticket info, online shop) - RED BULL ARENA (Stadium, arrival, tours) - SOCIAL MEDIA (All channels at a glance)
release_text: - New Splash Screen - Update Online Ticket-Shop - Update Getting tot he RBA - Bug Fixes

description: This is open source project. You can find sources here - https://github.com/Nikolay-Kha/TabletClock Do you have old tablet? Or do you want to make your lovely device to show time and weather forecast when it on charging? This application for you! Nowadays wall clock are quite stupid, but price for them is a little bit less that price for tablet PC. And weather station is expensive. So, why do you need to buy stupid clock or expensive weather station when you can take this application and the cheapest table pc or old useless one and get smart clock: - they wouldn't lost time during blackouts. And it even doesn't require batteries for that, because device already has rechargeable battery - screen brightness is auto adjustable. Even if your device has not light sensor - application use camera as light sensor (disabled in settings by default) - you can choose one of 16 million color for displaying - alarm clock from Android OS - displaying current date, sunset and sunrise - weather now, forecast for one day each 6 hour and forecast on next week: temperature, wind speed and direction, pressure, clouds, precipitation and if sky is clear - moon phase, Units for temperature, speed and pressure are adjustable. - automatic start and close application on plugged/unplugged charger ( disabled in settings by default ) - and even do not have to set up time on this clock, because Android OS could take time from network and you will have exact time! You can use this application for your lovely device like screen saver while charging. Especially for devices with dock stations. Just turn on autorun and autoclose feature in settings and clock will appear while device is docking. Tips: On first launch choose your city for weather forecast. If your device have navigation bar, it will be hidden on application start. Any touch return navigation bar to screen, is not affecting on application. Touch the alarm clock icon to show system alarm clock. Touch the time to show application menu (the same as menu button, in case if your device does not have menu button). Touch the weather to switch two types of forecast - dayly and weekly. If your device does not has a light sensor, but it has camera, better front, turn on brightness adjusting using camera in settings - it will measure light every 30 seconds. But if you run this on unplugged device it will decrease on-battery time. Time and date format are taken from system. If you need brightness lower that your device allows, change in settings -> text color value R, G, B to lower ones. For example: if you change green (#00FF00) to 80 instead of FF, brightness will twice lower. You can choose screen rotation in settings. Weather provided by OpenWeatherMap - http://openweathermap.org All weather data are provided under the CC-BY-SA 2.0 license - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0
release_text: v1.3 api key added v1.2 weather forecast now keeps in device memory, so app could show forecast even without internet screen rotation, portrait mode navigation bar remover improved date text over-filling fixed minor bugs+cosmetic fixes v1.1 android 4.4 KitKat support 2560x1600 devices support improved auto brightness adjustment using camera icons brightness now is depend on text brightness minor bugs fixes

description: This application is a useful tool to help you improve your English. We hope this application will prove to be a useful tool to help improve your English reading and listening skills. It is a collection of free English text and audio files we have gathered from the internet. We have put them together in one convenient place for easy access. The application connects you directly to our private server and allows you to download the files straight to your phone. The files are saved in the folder /sdcard/ListenEnglish. The first time you run the program you will see a message saying, “The English texts and audio files don’t exist on your phone. Would you like to download?” Choose ‘Accept’ to confirm. You will then be able to choose which files you would like to download. If you find that you cannot access the files after downloading them, simply navigate to the folder, delete the files, and re-download them. The more you download the more storage space it will occupy on your phone or sd card. Data charges may occur according to your data plan. The more data is used the more you may be charged. Wi-fi connections normally do not use the 3G network, so data rates do not apply. We will be updating our server from time to time adding more English text and audio files for you to enjoy. Updated lists will be automatically applied and available for viewing. *keyword Audio Book/English Listening/Study English/LC/Free Listening/Read Book/Read English/English Book/
release_text: v1.2 # The first run-time error correction. v1.1 # download problem fixed.

description: Lynkee turns your camera phone into a QR and product barcode scanner. Lynkee is regularly ranked as top performer in this category for its features, ergonomics and quick scanning. Lynkee 2 offers you a whole bunch of interesting new features and improvement: Optional and dedicated internal browser, Facebook and Twitter login, QR Generator, product search engine, keytags, Led Flash, faster scanning, history, price and satisfaction comparator …just download and enjoy it ! You can scan a QR code, Datamatrix and consumer product barcodes (EAN/UPC) in real-time and for a multitude of 2D code type: URL, Geo-location, Product, VCard, Mecard, SMS, Phone Number, Authentication, Text, Mail, Bookmarks… You may create your URL, text or contact QR codes with easy ; also you may generate for free your own QR codes on www.qreasy.com Lynkee more social ! …Edit your own Lynkee profile on your mobile or on www.lynkee.com: * Share your scan * Follow-up your activities (scans, bookmarks ...) on your laptop/tablet on www.lynkee.com * Share your generated QR codes * Add and share your product reviews Enter in the lynkee network !

Sudoku - Puzzle, develop your memory and thinking. If you've been in a book store in the last six months - or an airport, waiting room or college lecture class - you've probably seen someone staring at a sudoku. Given its popularity, one might think it's some new type of porn. But no, it's just a puzzle. It's a widespread, logic-based fad of a puzzle that is simple enough to suck you in and difficult enough to keep you hooked. In this article, we'll find out what a sudoku puzzle entails, how to go about solving one and where the concept originated (hint: It's not Japan. Let's get started. Sudoku is a game of numbers - specifically, the numbers 1 through 9 - but it really isn't about math. It's about logic. Instead of 1 through 9, you could use the first nine letters of the alphabet or a set of nine symbols, and it would be the same game. The basis of sudoku is a nine-by-nine grid. You've got three sections to think about: rows, columns and boxes. The goal of sudoku is to fill each nine-square row, each nine-square column and each nine-square box with the numbers 1 through 9, with each number used once and only once in each section. It's the interaction between the rows, columns and boxes that tells you where the numbers need to go. So if you were to start with a blank grid and fill in the numbers for row 1, column 2 and box 4 according to the sudoku rules. Of course, starting with a blank grid wouldn't make it much of a challenge. A sudoku puzzle already has some of the numbers filled in, and it's your job to figure out where the rest of the numbers go. Differences from the free version: - More games. - No advertising. Options: - 3 seasons with 150 games. 5 levels of difficulty. - Very comfortable dynamic keyboard to quickly select the correct number. - Rating game users with display of the country. - Displays the number of entering and remaining digits. - Painting numbers on the keypad at its full entry into the game (9 digits). - Add notes and more.
release_text: - New season games (150 games). - Fixed some bugs.

description: Find pairs and collect magical gems through multiple levels of raising difficulty in this unique game inspired by mahjong solitaire. Features: * Multiple levels, * Minigames (Memory and Rivers), * Hand drawn fantasy graphics, * Lives, * Zoom in and out, * Gems, * Dynamic fantasy music, * Challenging game play - beat the time bar! Turn off shadows on slower phones.
release_text: 1.50 15 new levels No need to unlock levels anymore Bug fixes

description: Forty Thieves is a challenging solitaire requiring some skill and patience. On easy level you can go through the stock three times which makes it much easier though. On hard level cards on the tableu that are not on top are hidden. The game is more suited for tablets and large phones because there is a lot of cards on screen - on small screen phones you might have problems navigating (480x320 is absolute minimum resolution). Rules - click on the left stack to get new card, - move all cards to foundations - from Ace to King, - you can place a card on another card if it's higher and is the same suit or put it on an empty space, - you can move only one card at a time Features - high resolution - undo - saving state - clean cards - zoom Check also our other solitaires!

The most popular solitaire in the world - Klondike Solitaire also known as Patience - with clear graphics perfect for phones and tablets of every screen size. Rules - move cards from A to K to foundations, - build piles down by altering colors (8 diamond on 9 cross), - in hard difficulety you can pass the deck only three time, Tips how to win - try not to move cards from top deck (waste) to your piles unless you really need them, - move cards to foundations (A to K on the top right) quickly, - use undo to solve harder cases. Features - autosave, you don't need to worry when a phone calls interupting your game, - three difficulty levels: draw 1 Klondike Solitaire (easy), draw 3 Klondike Solitaire (medium and hard) - score, - undo, - easy moving of cards (you can move whole pile even if you need to only move one card!), - smooth animations, - double click to move cards to foundation, - high resolution for ICS tablets and phones, - zoom In this release some things are not yet ready - but expect them soon: - music, - image backgrounds (right now you can only change colour), - additional card deck (like in Spider Solitaire HD). From the makers of Spider Solitaire HD.

Engaging puzzle platformer with adventure and arcade elements. Lead a wizardess, a troll and a knight on a journey home by jumping, collecting coins, solving puzzles, fighting monsters and interacting with funny creatures. Excellent 2D side-scroller for both casual and avid players in love with retro games with head-scratching puzzles and humorous dialogues voiced in a fun bable-talk. New levels coming soon. This is initial version, please report any problems.
release_text: 1.55 Fixes related to level 9 issues - thank for those who reported them! Polish translation 1.50 Blue episode with new levels

description: Classic Lines game - slide marbles to make lines of five. HD graphics makes it perfect for tablets and large phones. The game also has dynamite, stone marbles and question marks that make it more interesting and even more addictive! Try to get the best highscore!

Long time ago on a planet far far away there was a tribe of creatures called the Fluffies. They lived in peace until an Evil Fluffie stole all their sleepy brothers and scattered them in a strange space-time dimensions... Fluffies went through a portal to save their friends one by one and to defeat the Evil Fluffies... Push the Fluffies is a game where you push small creatures into portals to other dimensions to save them troughout different levels. Beautiful hand drawn graphics and engaging music combined with addicting gameplay will provide you hours of fun. More levels and improvements coming soon. Please report any bugs to the developer e-mail account. The game may require a high end phone or tablet to work smoothly. It is inspired by Lemmings but has quite a different game play.
release_text: 1.50 20 new levels in the Red Herring episode Bomb fluffies in Red Herring episode (upon request) Optimisation

description: Russian Solitaire is less known but very involving solitaire similar to Yukon. When playing 2 or 4 suits use undo to win! Features: - high resolutions for tablets and larger phones, - clean cards, - undo, - saving state, - 1 suit (easy), 2 suit (hard, use undo!), 4 suit (very hard, a real challenge) Rules - You can move any group of not reversed cards, - You can drop cards when card below has the same suit and is one point higher than the starting card, - You can put only Kings on empty places Tips - Try to release reversed card ASAP, - Don't move cards to the foundation too soon, they may be needed later Check our other solitaires!

Spiderette is a simpler version of Spider Solitaire. Clean cards and great graphics in this edition allow you to play for hours in one of the less known, but still very interesting solitaires. Rules: - it's a Spider Solitaire with one deck instead of two, - clicking on piles on the right deals new cards, - you have to build sequences from King to Ace, - moving requires the card to be in sequence and follow suit. Features: - undo, - saving state, - 1, 2 and 4 suit modes (easy, medium, hard), - restarting the same game. Check also our Spider Solitaire HD!

You don't need expensive, ineffective gadgets or complicated training routines in order to loose fat and improve fitness condition. A few but challenging minutes of our predefined body weight, high intensity interval workouts including cardio, plyometric, strength and balance exercises will quickly convince you that strong will and half an hour per day is more than enough for achieving your goals. If you are not familiar with any of the exercises from the included workouts, you can find short description for each one in section Workouts Library. The app also offers easy to use and configure timer that allows you define your own interval training. Set number of rounds, duration of working cycles and rest time and you can start! -------------- Overview on functionalities: - 3 predefined Tabata workouts (Tabata for beginners, Tabata for legs and Tabata for upper body) - Option to create your own tabata workout choosing between 20 bodyweight cardio moves - 3 predefined Bodyweigth workouts (Cardio for beginners, Cardio for intermediate/advanced, Strength) - Option to create your own Bodyweight workout choosing between 20 bodyweight cardio moves - 3 predefined 10-minute Challenges ( Plank Challenge, Burpee Challenge, Squat Challenge) - Configurable and easy to set up countdown timer - Alarm sound between work and rest periods. Alarm volume is controlled by the volume controls of your device - Warning ticks during the last three seconds of each interval - Workouts library with short description of each exercise, included in the predefined workouts -------------- Please feel free to write suggestions, comments, error reports or feedback to our e-mail as we cannot answer the comments - we will be more than happy to help and hear from our users!
release_text: Version 1.3.1: - Section Create Workout lets you set Rest/Working time, as well choose your exercises from a list of the 20 most popular once - New exercises were added to section Create Tabata Version 1.3.1.1: minor bug fixes Version 1.3.0: New predefined workouts, changes in the user interface, minor fixes of bugs.

description: このアプリは、「数学ナビ」（２００円） に全て含まれています。 過去の都道府県の公立高校入試について、一次関数、二次関数、反比例、図形（合同、相似、三平方、面積、長さ）、因数分解に関する問題を参考にプログラムしてあります。関数などの問題は、解く度に数値が変わるようにプログラムしてあります。 問題には、（１）、（２）、（３）などと「流れ」があります。画面の選択肢に触れることで、正解、不正解がでるとともに、それぞれの問題の流れを体験して下さい。 「因数分解」： 展開、たすきがけ、因数分解 「関数」： 北海道、青森、神奈川、新潟、滋賀、高知、東京 「図形」： 福岡、愛媛、広島、大阪、愛知、東京、新潟、沖縄 このアプリは、「数学ナビ」（２００円 ）に全て含まれています。 2014.02.07 追加項目 沖縄県の図形問題（２０１３年、２０１２年、２０１１年）を追加しました。 展開と因数分解１を加えました。 This app contains all the "math Navi" (200 yen). For public high school entrance examination of prefectures in the past, and has been programmed to reference the problem linear function, quadratic function, inverse proportion, (joint, similarity, three square, area, length), about the factorization figure. The problems such as function, you may have to program the number is to vary every time you solve. The problem is (1), (2), etc. (3) is "flow". By touching the screen of choice, correct, incorrect answers with Dell, to experience the flow of each problem. "Factorization": Deployment, cross-coupled, factorization "Functions": Hokkaido, Aomori, Kanagawa, Niigata, Shiga, Kochi, Tokyo "Shapes": Fukuoka, Ehime, Hiroshima, Osaka, Aichi, Tokyo, Niigata, Okinawa This app contains all the "math Navi" (200 yen). 2014.02.07 additional item I added (2013, 2012, 2011) the shape of the Okinawa problem. I added a factorization and one deployment.
release_text: 「関数」に、東京を追加しました。 「図形」に、新潟を追加しました。

description: This is a simple and free Sudoku game, that automatically gets a new Sudoku puzzle every day. "A Sudoku a day keeps the brain doctor away" From the menu you can get the last 10 days Sudoku puzzles, to get you started or if you missed some days.

How can an expense manager be both simple and intuitive and yet professional and strong? HandWallet Expense Manager is a free expense manager app used to control spending, plan budget, track expense and income and avoid over-draft. • FREE • Manage your cash flow, checking, bank account, credit cards, e-wallet or giftcard expenses • Interactive graphical charts of your expense and income • Voice recognition! Record your expense without typing (Expense Tracker Recorder) • Save you time: more than 100 built in categories and sub categories (Food, Health expenses, Transportation expenses etc) • Multiple accounts • Multiple currencies. Exchange rates manager - automatically online exchange rates • Travel abroad and manage all expense in your home currency! • Can link each transaction to categories (what is the expense?), location (where did this expense took place?), persons (who did the expense?) or projects (to what activity this expense is related?) • Plan budget for each category, person or project • Let you attach images, documents or voice memo • EXCLUSIVE! Payment manager and credit card manager - calculate the exact payments in your credit card according to your "grace period" and "due day". You will never be surprised again • EXCLUSIVE! Loans manager - calculate the interest and linkage on your mortgage or loans • EXCLUSIVE! Consumption manager - manage your expense by consumption. If you pay for something for the whole year show in the chart only the relevant part for each month! • Personal accountant. Business users can track invoices, receipts, delivery notes and VAT • Business users can manage different worlds: one for their business and one for their home • Manage expense anytime anywhere - internet connection not required • Personal Finance management: personal / family calculator. • Advanced search options to find a transaction bill invoice or expenditure • Backup & restore • Let you share your information to Facebook, Twitter, Google and other social networks • Online help within the app • Fast, reliable & secured. Password protection • Ahead of Daily expense manager, Mint, Pageonce, EasyMoney, Daily Money and others Why to use an expense manager / expense tracker ? Because tracking expenses and personal finance on a daily basis will give you control of your financial life, help you to be organized and pay bills, save you money and give you a better chance to discover your full financial potential. Why to use HandWallet Expense Manager ? Because it's the best expense manager app. And because we are creating expense manager and personal finance accounting software for 10 years and know exactly why most people want to manage expense but only few succeed. How to start ? Download the app for free. Verify that your language, country and currency are correct. Hand Wallet will create 3 default accounts: cash, bank account and credit card. You can later change the names of these accounts by pressing the "Data" tab and then "Accounts", for example HSBC, Barclays, credit card visa or electronic wallet. Then press the menu button and log your first expense. How to manage budget ? Select the "data" tab and then categories. Select your category, for example " car expense ". Press the "advanced" button and select the type of budget: fixed budget, summarized budget and so on. You can define a different budget for each period. How to see a bar or pie graph of your expense ? Press the "analyst" tab. Then select the category, for example "car expense" and the period. You can switch between expenses and budget by using the icon at the left. More add-ons to expense manager : Download budget and budget widget, accounting widget, personal finance location and bank SMS to add more features to HandWallet Expense Manager
release_text: Watch the video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=099FikXBWf0 *New UI* - you can control what tabs to put on the top panel (long press) - you can control what buttons to put at the bottom of each screen (long press) *New add on: Bank SMS* - create a transaction automatically from SMS you receive from you bank or credit card *Many other new features*

description: Let us introduce our latest developed application - Night Vision. The application takes real pictures at the lowest luminosity without any additional appliances. During the photo capture you can dynamically change camera sensitivity to achieve the best result. The application has own library to organize photos. • Аmplifier picker • Fast exposure • Front, rear camera • Led light • HD photo mode • Built In library

description: Dots and Boxes, also known as Boxes, Squares, Paddocks, Pigs in a Pen, Square-it, Dots and Dashes, Dots, Smart Dots, Dot Boxing, or, simply, the Dot Game, is a pencil and paper game for two players first published in 1889 by Édouard Lucas. description: Klondike is a patience game (solitaire card game). Many people refer to Klondike as patience or solitaire, it being one of the better known of the family of patience games. Features: * OLD classic playing cards!!! * High resolution playing board * Undo * Auto-save * Timer Taking a shuffled standard 52-card deck of playing cards, one upturned card is dealt on the left of the playing area, then six downturned cards. On top of the downturned cards, an upturned card is dealt on the left-most downturned pile, and downturned cards on the rest until all piles have an upturned card. The piles should look like the figure to the right.

“Dots & Triangles” is a variant of the popular classic paper-and-pencil dots game. Challenge your brain with this relaxing game and play with phone or friend. Now you can enjoy the game anywhere you may be, directly from your smart phone. Features: * On-line * One or Two player mode - test your skills against the computer or challenge a friend * 4 difficulty levels * 4 board sizes * Auto-save * Statistics * Attractive classic old paper interface * Attractive sounds and animations Game rules are pretty simple: * Tap on two available dots to connect them and create pencil-drawn line * Remember that line cannot cross other dots, lines or figures * Three connected lines form a triangle – try to shape more triangles than your opponent * If the line closes a triangle, then player takes another turn * The player with the largest area of shaped triangles wins the game.

description: BUSINESS CARD BOOK - an innovative, mobile application for creating, storing and sharing virtual business cards, as well as scanning traditional business cards. It`s also a modern communication center, gathering all your contacts information and social media in one place. CREATE YOUR OWN VIRTUAL BUSINESS CARD Easy to use editor with a load of options. - Choose one of five templates - Add your contact information - address, company name, position, phone numbers, etc - Add your social media information - Add a photo, logo or a picture, choose its size and position - Choose a background, fonts and colors and size of all elements - Use grid during creation process to help position all elements - Edit your virtual business cards to keep them updated, or delete them to create new SHARE AND STORE BUSINESS CARDS You can share and exchange your virtual business cards in a variety of ways, using technologies such as NFC, Bluetooth, QR Codes or simply email. MANAGE YOUR VIRTUAL BUSINESS CARDS HOLDER - Scan traditional and collect virtual business cards from other users and store them all in your virtual business cards holder - Search and sort your virtual business cards holder - Import your Google contacts into your virtual business cards holder - Export data from stored virtual business cards to your Google contacts - Enjoy an interactive view of all your created and stored business cards, where all the information are active and will take you directly to their destination (i.e. youtube link on a business card will take you to youtube, address will take you to Google Maps, etc.) - Select one of five unique color themes - Use the Business Card Book widget to put your favorite business card on your phone`s desktop for even quicker way to share it - Display your stored business cards during incoming calls USE THE BUSINESS CARD BOOK PRO. Business Card Book Pro features: - Import your own background or choose one from our premium backgrounds - Design the flip side of your virtual business card, add any content you wish to it - Enjoy unlimited number of created and stored business cards - Program an NFC tag to “carry” your virtual business card, share it even without your smartphone CREATE BUSINESS CARD BOOK CLOUD ACCOUNT. You can create a new BCB account from your mobile app. To use BCB web app login to your BCB account at www.bcbapp.com Business Card Book Cloud features : - Synchronization and easy access to your account from various devices (smartphone, tablet, laptop, PC ) - Use all the additional features of BCB web app and BCB Pro - Share your virtual business card via SMS - Automatic update of your virtual business card for everyone you shared it with - An URL and HTML code to make your virtual business card public - Scan traditional business cards and convert them into virtual ones with OCR technology - Export contact data from scanned business cards into your phones contacts - Create your own folders to sort your virtual business cards holder - Send a 'push' message to all user that have your virtual business card - Create a backup copy of all your business contacts ATTENTION : You can try BCB Cloud for free for 14 days, after registering a corporate account at www.bcbapp.com A corporate BCB Cloud account lets you manage several BCB user accounts, its designed to help manage virtual business cards within an organization. BCB Cloud offers all of the above features plus much more. IMPORTANT : We do not take responsibility for content put on BCB`s virtual business cards and any effects resulting from sharing them. All rights to BCB apps are reserved.

NGC Coin Details helps coin collectors verify authenticity and make more informed buying and selling decisions. This free app combines valuable information from the best of NGC’s coin research tools, like the NGC Price Guides and VarietyPlus®. Simply scan the barcode on any NGC-certified coin, or manually enter its certification number, to verify its authenticity. For NGC-certified US coins, you can access: Current market values from the NGC US Coin Price Guide VarietyPlus® attribution listing Coin specifications and images Detailed descriptions and analysis Upcoming auction information NGC Coin Details stores more than 100 coins in your search history for quick reference. It’s free, it’s easy to use, and you can take it wherever the hobby takes you. If you have any questions, suggestions, or come across any bugs please email us at mobileapp@ngccoin.com Numismatic Guaranty Corporation (NGC) is the world’s leading and largest third-party coin grading company. With a commitment to independent, unbiased grading, NGC brings stability and liquidity to the marketplace by guaranteeing the authenticity of every coin it certifies. The company offers product and service innovations, educational resources and community tools to keep collectors and dealers across the world connected and well-informed. By installing this application you are confirming your acceptance of the End User License Agreement ( http://www.ngccoin.com/EULA.aspx ).

This application requires root to access FBReader's data! If you do not have a rooted phone, or you deny this application root access, it will not function properly. Designed to work with the android e-book reader, FBReader, this app will sync your position (by paragraph and word) in every e-book you've opened with FBReader to the web. Ideal if you have multiple Android devices that you use with FBReader to read e-books on, or to back up/restore your positions before wiping your device. Once installed, all you have to do is specify a unique username and PIN # to identify you in the preferences, then click the orange icon to sync your positions. Use the same username/pin combination on multiple devices to sync the book positions from one device to another. When syncing, only positions that are farther along than your old synced position is saved, so if you read a book from the beginning to end (like the typical human) you should be good to go. With v1.0.14, added a Dropbox interface that will allow you to sync your actual book files from one devices to another (Or just back them up) using your very own Dropbox account! I am not affiliated in any way with the creators of FBReader, I'm just an avid fan of the application who saw a need, and decided to fill it. PLEASE use the email link below to notify me of any bugs, comments, or suggestions for improvements!
release_text: v1.0.26 - Updated to use new Dropbox API. Added ability to sync book positions to Dropbox. Implemented part of the FBReader API to add "Sync" to the menu item. Removed syncing of "Recent" books, it rarely worked correctly due to timing issues. v1.0.19 - Fixed several problems that occurred when using FBSync on Honeycomb devices. Confirmed to work now on Acer Iconia A500 tablets, expected to work on all Honeycomb devices.

description: Pic-A- Pec is an Augmentative and Alternative Communication (AAC) tool which facilitates communication for individuals, especially children, with a variety of needs. Its aim is to provide a functional and easily navigated platform for visual communication exchange that is adaptable for any skill level. Unlike other AAC apps, it assumes little to no prior knowledge of concepts such as categories, cause and effect and generalisation making it truly functional for any cognitive ability. It has considered issues such as sensory sensitivity, customisation for each unique user and more. Pic-A-Pec takes the frustration out of learning to communicate because of its ease of navigation and options to completely customise it. Pic-A-Pec works by scrolling through pages of icons, selecting the desired symbol which is visually sent to the sentence area. Upon sentence completion it can be presented to the listener or read out by the text to talk function. Each step of the process mimics physical picture exchange, only the user can do so using a platform that does not attract negative social stigma. Pic-A-Pec has been developed by a behavioural therapist with experience teaching and implementing picture exchange systems, giving an understanding of the challenges and requirements of meeting the needs of its users. It has been developed as an element to assist individuals and families by being time and cost effective. Please note: Mayer-Johnson Images in screenshots and video are not currently included with the app. Keywords: PECS, Autism, AAC, Text-to-speech, non-verbal, ASD The Picture Communication Symbols ©1981–2011 by Mayer-Johnson LLC. All Rights Reserved Worldwide. Used with permission. Boardmaker® is a trademark of Mayer-Johnson LLC.

description: “Hungry Bugs: Kitchen Invasion” is the best free tapping game for everyone! Kitchen is the most tempting place, ha? Right, because we find there a lot of various goodies. But! We can also find there many little, hungry, mischievous bugs. They want to taste our delicious cake just like we do. But would you accept to see your cake being eaten by some bugs? I doubt it! So if you want to protect your sweet course and stop the bugs from devouring it, get ready to tap a lot. They are hungry, they are fast and they are endless. DSO Planner is an astronomy observation planning tool with excellent star charting capabilities made by active and experienced amateur observers with a passion for visual observations. It has large integrated deep sky objects databases and provides an opportunity to create any number of user own object databases. DSO Planner boasts the largest star catalog among all Android astronomy applications (USNO UCAC4, 113 mn stars). The application excels at creating observation plans on the fly, has powerful note taking capabilities, PushTo and GoTo support and night (red) mode. Before installation please make sure that you have at least 2 GB of free space on your internal SD card to download application databases! (Note: due to Google Play rules this data cannot be moved to your external SD card - you must have 2 GB free on your internal SD card!) + Star catalogs. USNO UCAC4 (full star coverage to 16m, 113 mn stars), Tycho-2 (2.5 mn stars), Yale bright star catalog (9 000 stars) + Deep sky catalogs. NgcIc (12 000 objects including Messier, Caldwell and Herschel 400 objects), SAC (Saguaro Astronomy Club database, 10 000 objects), UGC (13 000 objects), Lynds dark and bright nebula (3 000 objects), Barnard dark nebula (350 objects), SH2 (300 objects), PK (1 500 planetary nebula), Abell cluster of galaxies (2 700 objects), Hickson Compact Group (100 objects), PGC (1 600 000 galaxies) + Double Star catalog. Brightest Double Stars (2 300 stars), Washington Double Star Catalog (120 000 stars), double stars from Yale catalog. Info Panel with PA and separation for each component. + Comet support. Orbital elements of around 700 observable comets could be automatically updated via internet + Minor planet support. Database of 10 000 brightest minor planets + Famous Steve Gottlieb Notes attached to NGCIC objects + Custom catalogs. Unlimited capability to create fully searchable own catalogs + Cross-match names database. Search objects by less common names + DSS imagery support. Download DSS images of any sky portion into offline cache and overlay it on the star chart + Offline images. Integrated set of images of most NgcIc objects, opportunity to add own images when creating custom catalogs + Nebula contours. Contours of famous nebulae + Object contours. Ellipse in real dimension and orientation + Night mode. Fully red screen with red keyboard and menus + PushTo for dobsonian mounts with setting circles. Level your dobsonian mount and perform one star alignment. The app will automatically recalculate az/alt numbers to easily hunt the object + GoTo for Meade and Celestron controllers with bluetooth dongle + Unique visibility tool. Only objects that are visible with selected equipment in the current sky conditions could be shown on the Star Chart (for objects from NGCIC/SAC/PGC catalogs) + Planning tool. Filter any objects database by observer location, sky condition, astronomical equipment, time range of observation and object features (type, dimension, magnitude, minimal altitude, visibility and other fields of own custom catalogs). Remove duplicate objects when searching in intersecting databases. Create up to 4 observation lists. Easily track observed and remaining to be observed objects with note taking tool + Import tool. Import observation lists in Sky Safari and Sky Tools format. Use pre-compiled Night Sky Observer Guide observation lists. + Note taking. Take text and/or audio notes + Observing places. GPS, manual coordinates, custom lists. Database with 24 000 cities worldwide + Equipment. Keep track of all your telescopes and eyepieces. Use them for object visibility calculation and star charting. Use 500 popular eyepieces database + Twilight calculator. Calculation of the full darkness for a current night and for a month ahead. + 2 visual themes (bright and dark) + Powerful share/export/import capabilities (of databases, observation lists, notes) Disclaimer
release_text: + action button for fast insertion of the location and equipment data into an observation note + option to temporarily set the Star Chart's time to the time when the object's note was taken (time machine) + improved import file selector, with sorting button (name, time, type), and extended file information + the add new/edit object in the database data fields are explained on input (i.e comets, minor planets) + new sort options in observation lists added

If you are looking for a voice controlled, virtual assistant, similar to Siri on the iPhone 4S, look no further. Just by asking, you can make appointments, send messages, set alarms and reminders, launch apps, call taxis, businesses and your contacts, check for stores, restaurants and bars around you and many things more. Omega can also answer general questions, do unit conversions, knows probably more about our world and the relations within it than you and is simply a good companion. It will follow along with the conversation and react intelligently to incomplete input and contextual assumptions. PLEASE READ THIS BEFORE DOWNLOADING: If you are getting "Server errors": Please update Google Voice Search in Android Market! If you cannot hear Omega talking: Please make sure that you have a text to speech engine installed! Omega will assist you in downloading this by clicking on "Check for TTS data" in the preferences(Press the menu button!). Thanks to fully supporting Wolfram|Alpha, Omega is able to answer complex factual questions. No other app, not even Siri, will answer these question acoustically: "What is the 30th Tuesday in 2015?" "Who is the president of Argentina?" "How many cups are five pound of lead?" "Population of the United States, divided by total world population?" "Who is the singer of Coldplay?" "Heart disease risk of a 30 year old male smoker?" "How many dollars are five euros?" "Will it rain in San Francisco tomorrow?" "When was the radio invented?" "Who invented television?" "What's the highest point in Canada?" "What's the stock price of Microsoft?" Check http://www.asyncsolutions.de/omega for a full description of all the features, including hands-free mode, "Start on proximity" and more usage examples! Also, try looking up music, videos, lyrics and images, ask for time and weather, check out routes and places on the map, or ask Omega to turn on and off your bluetooth and wifi and many things more! Omega uses the regular recognition engine from Google by default, as practically any app doing speech recognition on android. I find this to work very well, but this varies alot across different people and accents. You might want to try installing Vlingo and setting it up as the default recognition engine in your system settings. You might or might not find this to work better for you.

description: Derek Galloway is a retired U.S navy seal serviceman; who is now living a peaceful and happy life with his beautiful wife Julia. One day when he comes home; his world turned upside down and his vision got blurred by what lay ahead of him. His wife Julia was lying dead in her own pool of blood with her flesh torn to shreds and her body half eaten. Derek now realized why he didn’t come across people on the streets on his way back home and the town looked desolate and deserted. A deadly nerve agent Minoz-Z has accidentally been released into the air from a nearby top secret government research lab. The deadly virus wiped out the whole population of the small community and had turned them into flesh devouring Zombies. Upon reaching New York City, he is quickly recruited by the FBI’s to return to the deserted and zombie infested city for seeking any survivors left in the city. The game is fun to play alone, with a lengthy and exciting single-player campaign. This best zombie survival game should satisfy your need for experiencing some frantic scenarios involving the undead. Another simple and stylish date widget (4x1 size) with day of month, day of week, month and year display. Simple and clean date display on your home screen. You may choose default Android or any other installed Calendar, Clock or Alarm to launch on widget tap. Please use "Send error log" option in menu if you have any problem with Ext Date Widget. It will give some information about execution progress and will help to solve problems. READ_LOGS permission is used for this feature. Application does not send any data automatically and it does no require internet connection. Only you decide what to send and when to do it.

Refresh network signal in one click!! The only app in Google Play that can refresh signal connection in Android Lollipop (5.0+) without root permission! Network Signal cannot be boosted by an app, Network signal can be refreshed and recovered. Network Signal Refresher is not a network signal booster. No network signal boost is achieved here. NSR tries to refresh the network several times till you get a better network signal. So after using NSR, Your network signal can get increased in strength (If a strong signal is found by NSR) or stay constant (If there is no stronger signal in that area). Nearly a million users get their signal back using NSR, try now and enjoy! Highest rated network signal tool. 5000+ 5 star reviews! As it may require more than 15 minutes to evaluate NSR PRO, You may try it and if it doesn't work for you may ask full refund. No questions will be asked and full amount will be refunded. This goes for all 8japps apps. Feel easy and just try the pro version (faster and stronger than free version). [[Works perfectly for CDMA technology. GSM may not always work.]] NSR refreshes signal even in Lollipop without root permission! NOTICE: THIS APP WON'T ALWAYS WORK ON DUAL SIM DEVICES. Basically this app refreshes the signal certain number of times until a good signal is found. The signal setting is done by Android system itself when signal is forcefully refreshed by this app. ★Features/Expected results: ★ Refresh Network Signal(4G/3G/2G) and WiFi in 1Click. ★ Refreshing of signal results in good Internet browsing and downloading speed. ★ Set best WiFi connection (Refreshes the connections available). ★ 4G connection over 3G connection (Android system). ★ Results show good call quality after refresh. ★ Refreshes Wifi connection , Data connection & Signal Strength together in one click. ★ Fastest refreshing of signal, not more than a minute. ★ No data connection failures. ★ Auto Close after Refreshing network. ★ Notify last Refresh time. ★ No fake boosting offered, but refreshes/resets the signal and sets the best possible signal strength in that area. Know that the results are same as any other "Network Booster" apps. ★ Create Home Screen Shortcut by long pressing App Icon from App list and place it anywhere in Home Screen.

description: APPLICAZIONE RISERVATA AI TASSISTI ABILITATI AD ESERCITARE FUORI DAL BACINO AEROPORTUALE DI MILANO. Per la versione dedicata ai tassisti abilitati per il bacino areoportuale di Milano scarica "Taxiyoo Driver Milano" TaxiYoo è l’applicazione per gestire le chiamate e le prenotazioni di autopubbliche che include tutte le funzionalità per permettere ai tassisti dell’Area Metropolitana Milanese di acquisire le corse nel pieno rispetto delle normative nazionali, regionali e comunali vigenti. TaxiYoo è stata voluta dall’Unione Artigiani della Provincia di Milano forte della sua storica esperienza di supporto e di servizi ai tassisti e viene da questa promossa su diversi canali per realizzare un circolo virtuoso tra una adeguata copertura di Autopubbliche e una altrettanto significativa adozione di TaxiYoo da parte dei passeggeri Italiani ed Internazionali anche in ottica di prepararsi ad Expo2015. Grazie a TaxiYoo il tassista sarà in grado di acquisire nuovi clienti e di beneficiare degli investimenti pubblicitari fatti da Unione Artigiani. Le principali caratteristiche di TaxiYoo sono: - Verifica dell’identità del tassista e del numero licenza a maggiore tutela sia dei tassisti sia dei passeggeri - Gestione integrata dei turni - Gestione del libero/occupato integrata con il dispositivo a bordo Taxi - Gestione delle priorità ai Posteggi - Prenotazione corse per orari e giorni differenti APPLICATION RESERVED FOR TAXI DRIVERS QUALIFIED TO CARRY OUT THE DOCK OF MILAN AIRPORT. For the version dedicated to taxi drivers enabled for the basin areoportuale Milan download "Driver Taxiyoo Milan" TaxiYoo is the application to manage calls and bookings autopubbliche that includes all the functionality to allow drivers to acquire the Area Metropolitana Milanese racing in full compliance with national, regional and municipal regulations. TaxiYoo was desired by the craftsmen of the Province of Milan thanks to its historical experience and support services to drivers and this is promoted by different channels to achieve a virtuous circle between adequate coverage Autopubbliche and an equally significant adoption of TaxiYoo by Italian and international passengers in optical prepare for Expo2015. Thank TaxiYoo the taxi driver will be able to acquire new customers and to benefit from the advertising investments made by Artisans' Union. The main features of TaxiYoo are: - Verification of the identity of the driver and the license number of the taxi drivers is greater protection of both passengers - Integrated management of shifts - Management of the Free / Busy integrated with the onboard device Taxi - Management of priority parking - Reservations for racing times and different days

description: TaxiYoo è l’applicazione per gestire le chiamate e le prenotazioni di autopubbliche che include tutte le funzionalità per permettere ai viaggiatori dell’Area Metropolitana Milanese di prenotare le corse nel pieno rispetto delle normative nazionali, regionali e comunali vigenti. description: "Filastrocche dell'Avvento" è un calendario di Natale con le finestrelle da aprire, accompagnato da un sonaglino e fiocchi di neve. Crea un momento festoso e d'attesa, accompagnando i bambini verso il magico Natale. Ogni finestrella aperta scopre una filastrocca e un'animazione con suoni diversi ad ogni tocco. "Rhymes of Advent" is a Christmas Calendar with the windows to be opened, accompanied by a rattle and snowflakes. Create a festive time and waiting, accompanying children to the magical Christmas. Each open window discovers a rhyme with different sounds and animation to every touch.

aFilastrocche è un'applicazione pensata per aiutare i genitori a stabilire un momento di relazione con i bimbi, attraverso le filastrocche, assistendoli nella scelta e nella narrazione. aFilastrocche propone una filastrocca scelte tra le migliori della tradizione popolare, le stesse che da generazioni vengono utilizzate dalle mamme e dai papà d'Italia per rallegrare i propri figli. Ciascuna filastrocca è scritta su uno sfondo di colore coerente al tipo del componimento (conta, scioglilingua, canzoncina, ecc.), in modo che al buio si diffonda una luce colorata che aiuti a creare l'atmosfera. Inoltre, a seconda del tipo, un tappeto di effetti sonori accompagna la lettura. Attraverso la funzione di ricerca è possibile scegliere una filastrocca sulla base del tipo o dell'occasione, in modo da poter eventualmente personalizzare la scelta A breve le filastrocche esistenti saranno estese con pacchetti di nuove filastrocche acquistabili su Android Market aFilastrocche is an application designed to help parents establish a time relationship with the children through nursery rhymes, assisting in the selection and narration. aFilastrocche offers a nursery rhyme choices among the best of the folk tradition, the same that are used for generations by mothers and father of Italy to cheer their children. Each rhyme is written on a background of color consistent with the type of composition (counts, tongue twisters, song, etc.), So that the darkness will spread a colored light that helps to create the atmosphere. Also, depending on the type, a carpet of sound effects accompanying the reading. Through the search function you can choose a rhyme based on type or occasion, so you can eventually customize your choice A short rhymes existing packages will be extended with new rhymes for purchase on Android Market

aFiabe è un'applicazione pensata per aiutare i genitori a stabilire un momento importante di relazione con i bimbi attraverso il racconto della fiaba serale. L'applicazione vi offre oltre 300 fiabe, arriveranno a 365 con una serie di aggiornamenti gratuiti, in modo da avere una fiaba al giorno per tutto l'anno! aFiabe non racconta le fiabe direttamente ai bimbi, ma assiste i genitori nella narrazione e fornisce loro gli strumenti per commentarla e spiegarla; propone una fiaba o favola al giorno da leggere ai propri bimbi scelte tra le migliori fiabe della tradizione popolare, tramandate fino ai giorni nostri attraverso l'opera di autori quali Esopo, i Fratelli Grimm e Andersen. Aprendo l'applicazione, il genitore trova ogni giorno la fiaba consigliata per quella data, con le indicazioni sulla morale, l'ambientazione, l'occasione dell'anno in cui la fiaba è particolarmente adatta. L'applicazione presenta i personaggi principali e permette di sostituirne facilmente i nomi, così' - volendo - il racconto diventa personalizzato e i bimbi possono diventarne i protagonisti. Ciascuna fiaba è scritta su uno sfondo di colore coerente all'ambientazione del racconto, in modo che al buio si diffonda una luce colorata che aiuti a creare l'atmosfera. Inoltre, a seconda del tipo di fiaba, un tappeto di effetti sonori rende il racconto magico. Attraverso la funzione di ricerca è possibile scegliere una fiaba sulla base dello scopo (l'insegnamento che essa veicola), l'ambientazione o l'occasione, in modo da poter eventualmente personalizzare la scelta collegandola ad un'occasione particolare, o a un episodio della giornata. ** aFiabe: una fiaba al giorno da protagonista ** aFiabe is an application designed to help parents establish an important relationship with the children through the story of the fairy tale evening. The application offers you more than 300 stories, will reach 365 with a series of free updates, so you have a fairytale day for the whole year! aFiabe does not tell fairy tales to the children directly, but assists the parents in the story and gives them the tools to explain and comment on it, and proposes a fairy tale or fable per day to read to their children's choices among the best stories of the folk tradition, handed down to the present day us through the work of authors such as Aesop, the Brothers Grimm and Andersen. When you open the application, the parent is recommended for every day the fairy tale that date, with the directions on the moral, the setting, the time of year when the fairy tale is particularly suitable. The application presents the main characters and allows you to easily replace the names, so '- meaning - the story becomes personalized and children can become the protagonists. Each tale is written on a background of consistent color to the setting of the story, so that the darkness will spread a colored light that helps to set the mood. Also, depending on the type of tale, a carpet of sound effects makes the magical tale. Through the search function, you can choose a fairy tale based on the purpose (teaching it carries), the setting or the occasion, so you can eventually customize the selection by connecting it to a special occasion, or an episode of day. AFiabe **: a fairy tale starring a day **
release_text: v.1.4 - Aggiunte 40 nuove fiabe v.1.5 - Aggiunte 48 nuove fiabe v.1.6 - Aggiunta di fiabe a copertura di tutti i 365 giorni dell'anno

description: aTales is an application designed to help parents establish an important relationship with children. It drives your choice by purpose as moral, context and occasion. aTales present the main characters and allow you to replace the name, so children become the real protagonists. Sounds and colors add the right atmosphere. aTales does not tell the stories directly to children, but helps parents to narrate them and gives the tools to explain the tales. It suggests a fairy tale per day to read to their children, chosen among the best stories of popular tradition handed down until today through the work of popular authors. At startup aTales displays the fable recommended for that date, with moral, context and the occasion of the year suitable for that story. The application presents the main characters and allows you to easily replace the names, so the story becomes personalized and your children can become the protagonists! Each tale has a background associated with the setting of the story, so the iPhone will spread a colored light that helps to create the atmosphere. Also, depending on the type of fairy tale, a sound loop makes the story magical! Through the search function you can search for tale by purpose (the teaching it vehicles), the setting or the occasion, so you can find the fairy tale that fits your needs, connected with a particular event of the day or a recurrence.

L'applicazione consente di avere un supporto tecnico alla progettazione di soluzioni moderne per l'edilizia, basate sui sistemi costruttivi a secco Gyproc Saint-Gobain, leader nel mercato dei sistemi a secco, cartongesso e intonaci a base gesso. Grazie ad un percorso semplice e intuitivo, è possibile individuare le soluzioni progettuali Gyproc più idonee alle proprie esigenze, attraverso le opzioni principali: - per destinazione d'uso; - per prestazione di sistema. Sono a disposizione voci di capitolato, dettagli tecniche, disegni in dwg, certificati, assessment report e molto altro ancora. The application allows you to have a technical support to the design of modern solutions for the construction industry, building systems based on dry Gyproc Saint-Gobain, a market leader in dry systems, plasterboard and gypsum-based plaster. Thanks to a simple and intuitive path, it is possible to identify the most appropriate Gyproc design solutions to their needs, through the main options: - For use; - To system performance. Specification items are available, technical details, drawings in dwg, certificates, assessment reports, and much more.

L'applicazione progettata per l'utilizzo su tablet. TaxiYoo Hotel is the application to manage calls and bookings autopubbliche from hotels, restaurants and companies from all over Italy, which includes all the functionality to allow travelers to book rides in full compliance with national, regional and municipal regulations. Thank TaxiYoo the passenger may have a new tool to book a ride, so immediate and intuitive. The main features of TaxiYoo are: - Verification of the identity of the driver and the license number for greater protection of the passenger - Geolocation to call even when you do not know the exact address where there is - No additional cost to the passenger - Reservations ran for hours and days to come For a correct use of the app: 1. Use GPS only when the outside; in closed places insert address 2., The phone must be added to complete national or international prefix Warning: The use of the GPS application requires can shorten the life of the battery. description: ATI CPU Monitor is a Real-time CPU Usage Monitor.using this App you can see which process or Services takes your CPU Time. this CPU Monitor display CPU Usage in Percentage.and also Monitors all CPU Cores State and Usage.you can find about CPU Hardware information. See CPU Maximum frequency,Minimum frequency and Current Frequency of all CPU Cores. ATI CPU Monitor also Capable to Use as a Task killer App.you can kill Process and services to Clean Phone Memory and other heavy loaded process. task killer functionality does not harm your device because it is same as the kernel killing process to reclaim memory. ATI CPU Monitor auto kill feature is very good to auto kill all process or services in background. Features:- -> Monitor all running application process and services. -> Monitor total CPU Usage of all CPU Cores. -> Monitor RAM Usage. -> kill all process or select one; -> kill all services or select one; -> CPU Usage percentage of each process or service. -> Process details. -> Service details. -> CPU Monitor Notification bar. -> Auto kill Process and Services. Let's Download it Share and Rate this app on Google Play. Note:- Process and Services is kill-able but that can be restarted by Android System this method to kill any process does not miss behave. if you want to kill and restrict to restart again go to App Details and click force stop. This is Pro Version of CPU Monitor and Not Takes Advertisement. Before you Buy This Application please Download Free Version of ATI CPU Monitor if Working fine then Buy Pro Version. Thanks

Find local businesses or residential listing by toggling between a list-view and map-view, get directions, click-to-call a business, browse business' websites, and find enhanced information on business profile pages. You can also search for business types closest to you using GPS and then get instant turn by turn directions to any location. •One application that allows you to search for any business or person. •Uses GPS (where available) to find listings close to you, and view them on the map. •Instant directions and Turn-by-Turn Navigation available for users with GPS enabled devices using Google Maps. •Quick Find Shortcut Screen to search popular categories. •View detailed information on a business; this may include: addresses, phone numbers, email addresses, website URL’s, hours of operation, services, products, specialties, videos, photo montages and display ads (where available). •Instantly save any listing to your contacts or share the information by Facebook, Twitter, Email or SMS. •Built in QR Code Reader. Scan any QR or barcode code. Free multipage calculator with voice input for everyday use! ATNSOFT Calculator is a free multipage (multiscreen) calculator for everyday use for Android devices, that lets you: ✓ Instantly enter numbers and mathematical expressions using an ergonomic on-screen keyboard and voice input (currently supports English, Spanish, German and Russian). Just press the mic button and speak the expression (for example, 75 plus 12 times 5 = 75 + 12 × 5 = 135): it will appear on screen and the result will be calculated immediately! ✓ Sometimes you may need to make two or more calculations simultaneously. To do this, you can switch editing screens with a horizontal swipe along the top edge. ✓ All calculations are recorded in the calculations history (simply click on the result field), from where you can insert the expression and result into the editor. Any record from the history can be tagged with text. These records can be instantly deleted with a horizontal swipe. ✓ Execute mathematical operations with incredibly large numbers and expressions. Raise to the n-th power or extract the root of the n-th power (for example, 5 cubed = 5^3 = 125; the cube root of 27 = 3√27 = 3). Percentage calculations (for example, 200 + 10% = 220). ✓ Convenient, user-friendly settings that can be opened by swiping from the left edge of the screen or using a menu button. The settings include: vibrate on click, full-screen mode, keep screen on, and other options. ✓ The result is always displayed naturally, without incomprehensible E's, dashes, and numbers. ✓ Quickly copy the result to the clipboard (with a long press on the result field). ✓ Easily work with many memory cells, and easily switch between them. You can set a name for each cell, letting you intuitively use the memory for a specific field of activity. Important: For voice input to work without the Internet, the appropriate voice baselines must be turned on in the Android settings. However, voice recognition is more accurate and higher-quality with an internet connection. Free version restrictions: – Only 3 screens (pages) to switch. – Only 3 memory cells. – Only one design theme. – An advertising banner is displayed at the top.

The Official Arcus Motion ring 3D Augmented Reality application. Download the marker, print it and enjoy the 3D view of your favourite ring on your finger. Get the marker here: http://arcusmotion.com/marker.html What is AR and how does it work? Augmented Reality (AR) is a technology that lets you see digital content in real life environment. With AR you can see Arcus on your finger through you mobile phone's camera and check how cool will it look on your hand. To use AR, please follow these simple steps: 1. Download and print Arcus marker 2. Cut out the marker and wrap it on your finger 3. Start AR from the ARcus application with the "Show AR" button 4. Point the camera at your finger with the marker on 5. Try out all the colours!
release_text: - ARcus app now works fine on Samsung Galaxy S3 devices

description: Selecciona tus artistas favoritos de la app oficial de Sony Music y accede a sus últimas noticias, consulta sus fechas de conciertos y disfruta con todos sus videoclips cómodamente desde tu dispositivo. También podrás estar al corriente de sus últimos posts en Facebook y comentarios en Twitter. Y tendrás acceso a las noticias de Sony Music para estar al corriente de las noticias de todos los artistas que trabajan con nosotros. Choose your favorite artists Sony Music official app and access his latest news, check out their tour dates and enjoy all your music with the convenience of your device. You can also keep up with your latest posts on Facebook and comment on Twitter. And you will have access to news from Sony Music to keep abreast of the news of all the artists who work with us.

Sofeminine Buzz is the only app you need for your daily dose of need to know woman focused news. From fashion and beauty to entertainment and feminist issues, be in the know while you're on the go and never miss a must-share story. Extra features: Customize the content you want to follow and which push notifcations you want. Personalise your menu to the sofeminine sections you're most obsessed with! Content is easier to share than ever! Get your regular horoscope straight through our app Don't hesitate to send us your suggestions at communaute@aufeminin.com under the section "Contact us"
release_text: In this version, we fixed minor bugs. Indeed we optimized the reading of the quiz. Find out all quiz in Psycho section ! Thanks for your comments and see you soon on sofeminine buzz! sofeminine team

description: La voici enfin, toute belle toute neuve : l’appli aufeminin, réservée aux grandes bavardes et petites curieuses ! Pourquoi se séparer quand on a tant de choses à se raconter ? Et si on restait toujours ensemble pour papoter de tous les sujets (vraiment tous), juste entre nous ? Vos forums, albums préférés et messages privés se glissent dans votre poche… pour vous accompagner partout. aufeminin en appli, c’est pareil que sur l’ordi, mais en plus mimi :) Idées fabuleuses ? Questions existentielles ? Déclarations enflammées ? N’hésitez pas à nous envoyer des petits mots doux, on adore ça ! Notre boîte mail communaute@aufeminin.com et la rubrique ""contactez-nous"" de l’appli n’attendent que vous… A vos plumes virtuelles. L'application aufeminin buzz est aussi disponible : toutes les news People, Mode, Beauté, Maman, Cuisine,... Retrouvez aussi notre nouvelle application beauté Beautiful by aufeminin avec des conseils et bons plans beauté, des tests produits... N'hésitez pas à nous envoyer vos remarques et suggestions à communaute@aufeminin.com Here, finally, the whole beautiful new: the aufeminin app, reserved for large talkative and curious little!   Why separate when we have so many things to tell? And if we always stayed together to chat all subjects (really all), just between us?   Your forums, private messages and favorite albums slip in your pocket ... to accompany you everywhere. aufeminin in app, it's the same as on the computer, but also cute :)   Fabulous ideas? Existential questions? Inflammatory statements? Feel free to send us small sweet words, we love it! Our communaute@aufeminin.com mailbox and the "" contact us "" app just waiting for you ... At your virtual pens. The application aufeminin buzz is also available: all news People, Fashion, Beauty, Mom, kitchen, ... See also our new application beauty Beautiful by aufeminin with beauty tips and good plans, products testing ... Do not hesitate to send us your comments and suggestions to communaute@aufeminin.com
release_text: Nous avons corrigé quelques bugs mineurs dans cette version. Merci pour tous vos commentaires et n'hésitez pas à nous envoyer vos remarques et suggestions à communaute@aufeminin.com

description: What the Block?!™ is the 5-star rated puzzle game that will challenge both your brain and your dexterity! Named App of the Week by Corona Labs! How do you play? Just pick up and arrange the colored blocks to match a pattern. But don't forget about gravity -- the blocks have to stay in place after you let go! USER REVIEWS: - "I can't put this game down!!" - "Challenging and satisfying - I'm completely addicted!" - "I was so into this game, I missed my subway stop by 20 minutes..." FEATURES: - Over 250 hand-designed puzzles! - Beginner and Easy puzzles will get you started, while Expert and Genius puzzles will have you shouting WTB?! - Awesome retina display graphics with unique, dynamic lighting and sound effects - Intuitive multi-touch controls - Realistic physics - feels like playing with real blocks! - Share your scores and achievements on Facebook

PLEASE NOTE: Only for use with ThemeChooser! Any custom rom with root with this will work! CM10 and AOKP are just examples. With the smooth gradients of the Aventador, mixed with the crimson hue creates an image that is pleasing to use and see. With the clean interface, Crimson is highly suited for any phone of choice. Crimson is a shade of red, and it fits the android style effectively and still maintains the refined touch of the interface. Works on most CM sourced ROMs, including, CM10, CM10.1, AOKP, Paranoid Android, etc.. >> What's Theme Chooser & how to I apply this theme?: - Theme Chooser is theme engine included in popular custom ROMs such as CM10, AOKP, and many more. - Download and install this app and then navigate to Settings -> Themes, select this theme and apply it. >> TROUBLESHOOTING: - IF you see this error: "THIS THEME WAS IMPROPERLY COMPILED AND CANNOT BE APPLIED...", RE-APPLY the default "System" theme AND either: - REBOOT - OR, clear cache & data of "ThemesProvider.apk" & "ThemeChooser.apk", then apply the theme. -If everything else fails on this error, please go to: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=35499500 Simply flash the zip. - This error: "SORRY, THIS THEME IS MISSING ASSETS FOR YOUR DEVICES SCREEN SIZE," is HARMLESS, just ignore and select "APPLY ANYWAY." If you have issues, please contact me at: auroraprimellc@gmail.com ---------------------------------------------------------- TAGS: Cyan Azure Holo Blue Theme Skin CM10.1 AOKP Interface UI Alloy Popstyle MIUI Tersus Apex Nova Prime Specart custom themechooser mac apple iphone galaxy s3 note tegra 4 Jelly Bean complete ice cream sandwich Android 4.0 4.1.2 4.2 4.3 Black Ops 2 style sleek intuitive cyanogenmod open kang slimbean XHDPI high definition resolution HD quality metallic metal aluminum gradients gray grey white dark light lamborghini car engineer team fortress nexus toggle tiles white light dark original red maroon light red pink crimson scarlet rose blood
release_text: -MMS white on white fixed FINAL VERSION!

description: Australian Dictionary is the comprehensive and trustworthy free online dictionary for Australian English slang, words, phrases and sayings. Australian Dictionary is the free online slang dictionary for Australian English and Aussie slang. Thousands of Australian slang words & Aussie phrases defined and rated by our users. Also on the web: AustralianDictionary.net

The free, bilingual Australia Plus China app invites you to learn about life down under. It’s the perfect pocket guide if you are interested in living, studying or travelling in Australia. • Discover what it’s like to study in Australia, with articles about universities and courses for international students. • Browse the latest trends transfixing Aussies, from arts and entertainment, fashion and business, to debates about current issues. • Read articles about Aussie animals and the best destinations to visit in Australia. • Easily switch between English and Chinese, take short English lessons via video and test your knowledge by taking a quiz. • Have fun getting to know Australian animals by taking selfies with our A+ Aussiegram feature. You could be kissing a koala, smooching a swan or even caressing a deadly crocodile. • Take the quiz to unlock more screens with cute Aussie animals, and remember to share your selfies with your friends (including us!). Download the Australia Plus China app – your pocket guide to Australia.
release_text: Bobbie Bear special promotion New Menu categories Improved font size on phablets Audio settings follow your device App retains your preference of “article view” or “quiz view”

description: The free, bilingual Australia Plus Indonesia app opens the door to down under. Practise your English and learn about arts and culture, fashion, business, travel and living in Australia. 1. Discover what it’s like to study in Australia, with articles about universities and courses for international students. 2. Read articles about Aussie wildlife, local attractions and the endless opportunities for adventure down under. 3. Easily switch between English and Bahasa Indonesian, take short English lessons via video and test your knowledge by taking a quiz. 4. Have fun getting to know Australian animals by taking selfies with our Australia Plus Aussiegram feature. Picture yourself kissing a koala, smooching a swan or caressing a deadly crocodile. 5. Take the quiz to unlock more Aussiegrams, and remember to share your selfies with your friends (including us!). Download the Australia Plus Indonesia app – your pocket guide to Australia.
release_text: App retains your preference to view articles in quiz or list view Enter the Australia Plus Learn English competition directly from the app Audio settings for video follow your device setting

description: Welcome to AutismClassroom.com's App. The "AutismClass" app is the new application for educators and families who have children with autism in their lives. It was developed by the owner of AutismClassroom.com, who is an Autism Educational Specialist with over 15 years experience working with individuals with autism and who is the author of How to Set Up a Classroom for Students with Autism, How to Set Up a Work Area at Home for a Child with Autism, and Lesson Ideas & Activities for Young Children with Autism and Related Special Needs. The app is intended to provide a wealth of easy to understand information that allows teachers, para-professionals, administrators, related service providers, parents, family members, babysitters, and in-home support providers, quick access to ideas for sparking meaningful lessons and activities for young children with autism. The app includes a brief Autism Classroom Checklist to give administrators, teachers and parents a starting point to evaluate a classroom that educates students with autism. Additionally, the behavior tabs help users to critically think about their current behavior interventions, while highlighting new strategies and solutions for challenging behaviors for children and teens with autism. Some features on this app: • Stay updated with blog postings from AutismClassroom.com • Get fun and interactive activity ideas for joint attention, fine motor, social skills, communication and more • Over 100 strategies for addressing over 15 different common challenging behaviors • View an Autism Classroom Checklist to help evaluate an autism classroom • Purchase books for educators and families • Perfect for teachers, para-professionals, administrators, related service providers, parents, family members, babysitters, and in-home support providers The Autism Classroom app provides affordable information that is practical in nature and assists adults in creating environments that increase positive outcomes for children with autism. Try it today and tell a friend, co-worker or family member. Our Other Apps: Autism Classroom Set Up Autism at Home

//****\\ THIS APPLICATION WILL NOT ROOT YOUR DEVICE //****\\ This minimalist application checks if your device has root access by tapping just one button. The goal of this app is to provide a simple method to check if your phone is rooted. If you have a proper root access, you get a green message with the next words: "Root access is granted". If you only have su binary installed, you get a green message with this words: "Rooted". If your device is not rooted, you get a red message. *The permit network access is only to show a small banner ad* SEO: Root Checker, Check Root, Root Access, SU Check, SU Checker, Verify Root
